characters: SLIGHTLY CLEARER VERSIONS OF A HUMAN MAN AND CHILD IN A

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On the awesome WB LOGO made of LEGO bricks. We PUSH through it and find ourselves in a STARFIELD.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A COMET streaks towards us. We FOLLOW as it blasts past. The ground plane rushes up to camera. BLACK.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HELICOPTER SHOTS over various landscapes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No one knows where it came from. There had been others. Mysterious relics of another world. But only one with the power to stop the world.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SHKBOOM!!! The comet makes impact! A LEGO explosion! We peer into the smoking crater. Fire amid blackness.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Many vied for its dark magic. A few brave souls endeavoured to hide it from those who would use it for ill. Until finally, thankfully it was lost to history.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly, we are blinded by a powerful TUNNEL OF LIGHT. It's an animated LEGO version of the light tunnel in 2001, which was directed by Stanley Kubrick, who knows a thing or two about making movies, so don't step.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We push forwards, headed into a new world.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ours is a story of a world that knows not where it comes from. That cannot imagine what it is capable of. Perhaps you can relate. I know I can.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The most killer looking ancient vine-encrusted jungle temple of all time. The whole thing is made of LEGO.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHYRON: "Ten billion years later" 2.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: REVEAL LEGO INDIANA JONES and two GUIDES. Indy puts up a hand for them to stop. He removes a RUBY RED PIECE from his bag and connects it to the temple. The piece GLOWS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A dark passageway opens, and Indy lights a torch. The flames are made of ANIMATED LEGO BRICKS. The guides are too scared to continue. Indy's not.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A beautiful room made entirely of GOLDEN BRICKS. In the center is a GOLDEN SARCOPHAGUS guarded by statues of gods from every ancient civilization imaginable.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Indy carefully lifts a tablet from a statue of Zeus and places it into the sarcophagus like an ATM card. He pushes a bunch of cuneiform buttons - a PIN NUMBER.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The sarcophagus opens. A white-hot glow on Indy's face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BLAM!!! The entire room shakes. The statues are blown apart!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The smoke clears. Enter THE BLACK FALCON, the most evil person in the universe. He's flanked by ROBOT guards.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Black Falcon. I should've known.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey Indy. Uch. Who built this place? Must have been a bunch of lazy hippies, sitting around a table agreeing with each other.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It was built by the ancients. With more wisdom and artistry than you can ever know.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Black Falcon basks in the glow of the sarcophagus.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Kragle...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That belongs to the Maker. It must be protected! 3.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What a lame boyscout thing to say! You're standing before the most powerful object in the world and you don't want to use it? You're a real nerd, Indiana Jones.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The BF motions and his guards carry the sarcophagus away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The MasterBuilders will learn of this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And what do you know of them?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Only that they will be your undoing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adieu, Dr. Jones. That's French for ciao.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He exits. As the sarcophagus crosses the threshold of the temple, walls shake. The temple is CRUMBLING.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Left for dead, Indy uses the falling pieces to build himself a sweet rocket ship and blasts out of the temple. Narrowly avoiding a big rolling LEGO ball, probably.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A farmhouse in the hills. Indy rolls up and pulls the teat of a goat, which opens a SECRET DOOR.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Art studio meets SuperFriends headquarters. Badasses are MEDITATING, including GEMINI, a mysterious cloaked figure, and KRAV M'GA, the boss. Indy bursts in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PUSH IN dramatically:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Black Falcon has the Kragle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PUSH IN dramatically:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gemini. Find the Chosen One. 4.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PUSH IN dramatically:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BOOM. Something big just landed outside. Indy looks at his foot. Attached is a blinking red brick. Oh no.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They followed me...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CRASH! It's a full scale assault by hundreds of ROBOTS. The MasterBuilders fight valiantly but are overwhelmed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gemini runs from the fight, then stumbles, overcome with emotion as we hear the battle being lost. Amid the screams, Krav M'Ga's final words echo through Gemini's head...

dialogues.speaker: KRAV M'GA, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Find the Chosen One...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Emmet!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DORIS, a dowdy mom, calls through her son's door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did you clean your room?! The cleaning woman is coming today!

dialogues.speaker: EMMET, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: Then why do I need to clean?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Because I want her to know what a nice rule-following son I have!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Doris walks into his meticulously clean room to find Emmet, 22, a total square, in his underpants.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mom!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aw, it is clean. 5.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's always clean!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just like I taught you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's the point of having my own apartment across the hall from your apartment if you're going to check up on me like I still live at home?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Emmet "pulls" on a pair of mini-fig legs. Replaces his torso with a shirt. Takes off his hair and puts on a construction hat. Ready for work. Doris is so proud.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I just love you and want my son to be safe and happy. Can't you work from home? Like a sociopath or children's book author?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mom. I've spent my whole life here. I need to go out there and follow my dream of fitting in and being like everybody else.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My boy. All grown up. Maybe soon you'll meet a girl and be married!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mom, please!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm just saying, it's been how many years since Lucy?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (changing the subject) Mom... I had the dream again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EMMET'S RECURRING DREAM: A middle school classroom. Everyone wears blue. Young Emmet wears red. The ART TEACHER walks around, commenting. 6.

dialogues.speaker: EMMET, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: It was the same as it always is. Seared in my memory...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everyone dutifully draws the same drawing of a hand, but Emmet draws two hands close together so they look like eyes. He draws a mouth and pupils. The teacher stops.

dialogues.speaker: BAD ART TEACHER
dialogues.text: Emmet. This wasn't the assignment. You've got to learn to follow the rules.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She holds up Emmet's drawing for all to see.

dialogues.speaker: BAD ART TEACHER
dialogues.text: Everyone, the assignment is to draw your hand, not a silly face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SLOW MOTION: All the kids in the class GASP.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Emmet sits alone, crying. The other kids sit at other tables and whisper...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's the guys who drew a face. / What a weirdo. / He doesn't know how to follow instructions. / He's not invited to my birthday.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Emmet ERASES his drawing, a pariah. A little GIRL looks at him from afar with sympathy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I hated that day. The kids were so mean, the school tried to expel you... I promised myself I'd never let anything like that happen to you again. And it hasn't. So you need to let your memory of that day go. It never happened.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I just want to be normal, Mom.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Listen. You're my son. And you're the most normal, regular, average person I know. 7.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You mean it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you crying?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. Yes. Emmet...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She wants to tell him something, but thinks better of it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't forget dinner.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Promise.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Be safe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Of course.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't make waves.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I never do.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And follow the instructions.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Always.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If they weren't so firm and flush with your head, I would pinch your cheeks right now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Love you, Mom.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Love you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He EXITS, leaving her alone in the room. She SIGHS. 8.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Emmet drives into the most elaborate LEGO city set ever. Everywhere are dozens of STREET SIGNS offering detailed instructions for what you should and shouldn't do. Everyone drives the same speed in the same direction, listening to the same station, moving to the same beat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MUSIC: An insanely catchy pop song.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's another beautiful day in Legopolis and on Empura Radio. Reminding you don't forget to re- elect President Iamnotarobot for President of the City on Tuesday. Now, for the 258th consecutive week at #1, here's the No News Gnus with their hit "Everything is Awesome."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah. I love this song! And so does everyone else!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In what feels like a musical number, Emmet drives past vignettes of citizens happily going about their day and loving this song! BILLBOARDS everywhere advertise EMPURA, a company which apparently owns everything.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everyone walks in the same direction and goes in to various identical-seeming coffee shops.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SECURITY CAMERA FOOTAGE: A camera scans for something, or someone, but can't tell Emmet from the rest of the crowd.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A Starbucks by a different name. Mixed with a Hot Dog on a Stick. Emmet arrives at the counter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hello.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What'll it be?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm Emmet. 9.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Larry?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, Larry, I'll have one coffee please.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cappuccino, macchiato, espresso, americano.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are those? Sounds a little foofy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're all coffee.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh. Well, whatever isn't too wild. I don't know, what do you think?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A decaf.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, yeah. Cool.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Venti, Grande, or Super Grande?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, goodness. So much selection. So hard to decide! You pick.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's a personal decision that only you can make.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uh. Gosh, which is the most popular?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Super Grande. It's Italian for medium.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Medium. That's what I'm havin'! That is my style.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fantastic. 10.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You creative types! So delightfully sardonic!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I push one of two buttons on a machine. I would hardly call that creative. I would call that following instructions.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But it says Kreative right on your shirt! With an extra "kreative" spelling aberration! I totally don't get it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Emmet exits the shop and passes an EMPURA billboard asking him to reelect President Iamnotarobot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A television in a shop window shows highlights of a debate between Iamnotarobot and Stooge Strawman.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Emmet finishes the drive to work. Everyone pulls into their parking spaces at the same time, like clockwork.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Emmet walks out and looks at his new work place. His breath is taken away as he gazes on a beautiful...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A fantastical construction site. Super-awesome cranes. Emmet walks and talks to his new boss.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alright, kid. Here's the rules.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ooh, great.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stay on your feet--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mmm hmm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stick to the instructions--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uh huh. 11.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And don't get creative!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Emmet GUFFAWS like that's the craziest idea ever.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, Steve, don't worry. I'm not some kind of foofy weirdo, Steve!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The laugh together for a LONG TIME. Then,

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's Sean.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They walk past BIG STACKS OF PIECES moved by MACHINES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The pieces get sent down from corporate bundled together with the instructions. Take the one with your section on it and follow it to the letter. Keep track of all the pieces. If you lose one of the special ones it'll seriously drive you crazy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They casually step across girders high above the city.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Today you'll be putting together an artists' loft.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is it for an artist?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, no. It's for an accountant.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, great.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pretty soon, the whole city will look like this. All part of some big master plan from Central.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They arrive at the COOLEST CONSTRUCTION MACHINE EVER. Emmet opens up his actual size LEGO instructions.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What if I mess up or lose my place or something?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just do what everyone else does. Keep your head down, follow instructions, and you could get promoted. Central's got some big project coming up overseas.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Overseas? I don't know. I'm not big on travel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whatever, kid.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One more question.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Emmet puts a hand on his shoulder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you. For making my dreams come true.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is that a question?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Emmet puts his hands on the controls, savoring this moment, and finally puts his first brick in, according to the plan. It's an awesome feeling. Another. Another. He gets in the zone of building. This feels right.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lunchtime. Emmet looks at a heart-shaped COOKIE his mom baked for him. "I love you" in frosting. He flips it over. "Be Safe!" He looks over to the other INSTRUCTION WORKERS, eating lunch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Silence. 13.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How about that local sports team? What do you think of how they played the other day?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ugh, they were awful.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Right? They should make a personnel change of some kind.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, the coach!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's the only good thing about that team.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They should so keep him!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're all going to watch the game after work. Eat a little grub. Want to join?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Really?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Actually, I'm supposed to have dinner with my-- What the heck? I'm in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alright then.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cool. Definitely cool.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey did you hear that song on the way in to work this morning?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everything is Awesome? I love that song.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Me too! 14.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think I know why I like that song so much.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why's that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Because everything is awesome.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh yeah. / Good point. / I never thought of it like that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Emmet smiles his butt off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Emmet is back to building. He takes a look at the city from the highest height. It's beautiful. He's downright INSPIRED looking at it. He sees the LEGO brick clouds in the sky slowly form the shape of a FACE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We ZOOM IN to Emmet's MIND. We see LEGO SYNAPSES firing. A CONNECTION between two halves of the brain. An IDEA.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We pull back to REVEAL that Emmet has accidentally built, instead of a window, a SMILING FACE, reminiscent of the one he drew in class all that time ago.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kid! What the heck is that?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, uh. I don't know. What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's not the instructions.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know what happened. I was just looking out at the clouds, and-- It was an accident.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Foreman picks up the phone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We got a loose brick! Code Danger!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Code Danger? What's so dangerous? 15.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just then, A CRANE OPERATOR notices the happy face. His distraction causes the crane to go in the wrong direction and SMASH a wall. The falling bricks cause an elaborate chain reaction that tips the structure over.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chaos! Instruction workers run away for their lives!

dialogues.speaker: DISPATCHER, (OVER RADIO)
dialogues.text: Loose brick!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Loose brick!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Loose brick!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The cops throw their lunch out the window, shattering it. They pop the sirens and take off!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The cops hit the gas! We PULL WIDER revealing dozens of other POLICE CARS doing the same. Sirens blaring.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The condo tips over an adjacent condo (with someone living in it, of course) which hits another and another, the buildings going down like elaborate dominoes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thirty COP CARS, an AMBULANCE and FIRE TRUCK screech in. Cops run full tilt to keep the buildings from falling.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stop that building!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The cops jump out and stare up at the last domino, which falls on them. SMASH! The remaining cops look at Emmet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Emmet is in the back of the car. 16.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --unbelievably sorry. I am honestly the last person who would do something like thi--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Emmet is being booked.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --eriously, a model citizen. I got straight As. I vote! Even in the off-year elections, for school board and stuff--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Emmet sits chained to a desk in the shadow of two DETECTIVES. They look slicker than the others.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --swear, I'm not special at all. Just ask my mom! I'm a totally average normal person!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh yeah? What size coffee do you drink?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Super grande.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dammit! I can't break him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You don't need to break me! I'm just a regular old totally

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Emmet is in jail. He has a huge scary convict roommate.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm Emmet. What's your name?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (< NOTHING >)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Doris sits at an empty dinner table set for two. She picks at her food and sighs. Her only company is the TV.  TV ANCHOR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...we're still following the story of the construction worker who got a little creative on his first day on the job. The subject was described as looking and acting exactly like everybody else... Police have taken the nondescript suspect into custody, and he is being held in the city jail.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Doris sees the brick happy face and knows it has to be Emmet! She looks worried. Then oddly STEELY.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Emmet lies awake, sad.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Something is moving in the field outside Emmet's Cell. It's DORIS! She pulls apart bricks in the ground.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CLOSE ON A RACQUEL WELCH POSTER. A blowdart gun emerges from her belly-button. TH-THOONK! Two guards outside Emmet's cell go down. DORIS bursts through the poster!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The following conversation is WHISPERED.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mom? What are you doing here?  DORIS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm breaking you out.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But, that's breaking the rules. You told me never to do that. 18.   DORIS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well I'm temporarily reversing my position for reasons of convenience.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?  DORIS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The rules are different now.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But I did something really bad.  DORIS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No you didn't.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mom. You taught me to be a person of principle, and I stand by my principles of doing whatever authority tells me to.  DORIS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Great. Fine. Would you mind holding my purse?  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sure.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THOONK! Doris blowdarts Emmet, who passes out. Doris drags Emmet by the purse through the hole.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Doris and Emmet tunnel in, to the surprise of CUSTOMERS. Doris tries to make Emmet seem like a normal shopper. He is still holding her purse in a coma-grip.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: GROCERY SECURITY CAMERA: zooms in on Doris. We see face recognition graphics, then zoom in on her BIRTHMARK.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Doris pushes him in a shopping cart through the parking lot and into an ALLEY. Emmet comes to.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wh-- what are you doing?  DORIS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Saving your life. 19.   EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where did you get a blowdart?  DORIS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's not important.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Half my body is numb! My hand is stuck shut! That seems important!  DORIS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I just broke you out of prison!  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: For a misdemeanor! They didn't even decide how long I'd be in there for yet.  DORIS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They won't ever decide. You don't UNDERSTAND--  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You don't understand! I was having the best day of my life today. I was one of the guys. We were going to go to a dinner and talk about life and stuff--  DORIS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You were supposed to have dinner with me.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I was going to call.  DORIS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well it feels amazing to spend twenty years loving and protecting someone and the first day out of the nest they wind up on the news.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I made a mistake. I'll explain it to the judge tomorrow and everything will be fine. Only it won't because I can't because suddenly I am an ESCAPED FUGITIVE!  DORIS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's for your own good. 20.   EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can't protect me my whole life.  DORIS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You wanna bet? Come on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A beat. Doris continues but Emmet doesn't follow.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mom, I'm going back to jail to repay my debt to society. A society that I would like to be a part of.  DORIS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You have to trust me--  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You have to trust me! I'm my own person. You have to let me grow up and make my own choices--  DORIS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I tried, and look what happened!  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maybe if you didn't mother me so much I'd have been a little better equipped. Ever think of that?  DORIS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As a matter of fact I did. All the time.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ugh. You know what you are, Mom? You want to really know? A real pain in the elbow!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He turns away from her. Behind Emmet, three ROBOTIC NINJAS silently land, and shoot a human-sized RUBBER BAND from a bent PAPERCLIP at Doris-- it wraps around her, tying her up! They grab her and pull her into a SLEEK

dialogues.speaker: BLACK CAR
dialogues.text: DORIS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Emmet!  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He whips around just in time to see her being taken. 21.   DORIS

dialogues.speaker: EMMET
dialogues.text: EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mom? Mom!!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Emmet is TACKLED by a hooded figure: GEMINI.  GEMINI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where did she go?!  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's happening?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gemini grabs a mailbox and STARTS TAKING IT APART! Does the same with the shopping cart and other nearby items, REBUILDING them into an awesome mailbox-style SUPERCYCLE!  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How did you--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gemini takes OFF! Emmet, in pursuit, runs into TRAFFIC. He flags down a DUMPY CAR.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My mom got kidnapped by ninjas then a lady turned a mailbox into a motorcycle and now we have to catch up to them! Oh, hi, Larry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's the guy from the coffee shop.  BARRISTA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get in, I guess?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Emmet gets in and slams his foot on the gas!  BARRISTA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's with the purse?  EMMET (OVERLAPPING)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's my mom's.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everyone is going in the exact same direction. Except three cars driving madly against traffic! So begins the craziest, most wonderful LEGO CAR CHASE OF ALL TIME! 22.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Doris is tied up in the back in the rubber band.  DORIS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do you want with me?!  NINJA #1

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know what we want.  DORIS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You have the wrong person!  NINJA #1

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do we?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He pulls back her sleeve, revealing the star-shaped mark.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gemini tries to keep up with the ninja car. Emmet, in Larry's car, catches up. They are going super fast and dodging cars while screaming across traffic.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Emmet leans out of the car.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mom! I'm sorry! Don't worry, I'm going to save you!  GEMINI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stop, Emmet! You're going to screw everything up!  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, I'm not! How do you know my name?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He loses control of the car and CRASHES INTO Gemini! The cars tumble in a big heap. You can't tell where the car stops and the motorcycle begins. Larry and Emmet are upside down in seatbelts.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gemini is thrown from the cycle during the crash, but gets up and rebuilds the two vehicles into one SUPER CAR CYCLE that's a mashup of both! Gemini is in the driver's seat, Emmet in passenger, and Larry in the back.  LARRY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the FLIPPING FLIP IS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They crash through an EMPURA BILLBOARD. 23.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SLOW MOTION: The car smashes into pieces and Gemini rebuilds them, incorporating some of the billboard pieces into the restored vehicle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The new vehicle hits the ground and continues in pursuit.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're breaking the speed limit, you know. Not to mention several other laws, as a well as a few other things that are not written into law per se, but are accepted social practices.  GEMINI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Emmet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gemini drops the cloak hood, revealing...  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lucy?  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's Gemini now.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you a DJ?  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She builds the glove compartment and antenna into a CROSSBOW and ARROW.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So, uh, how have the last seven years been?  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lucy shoots a tethered arrow at the NINJA CAR. Bullseye.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Doris, tied up, sees Lucy and Emmet in pursuit.  DORIS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Emmet?! (TO ROBO-NINJAS)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't you dare hurt him. 24.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ROBO-NINJAS LAUGH as she struggles against mysterious restraints that, strangely, cannot be broken!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The two cars are TETHERED TOGETHER as they race through the streets, making the chase even more BADASS.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So. I have a lot of questions.  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is this really the best time to talk?  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, so far...  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fine. Shoot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lucy pulls out a pistol, leans out the window, and returns fire as the bad guys shoot at them.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why did those ninjas take my mom? Why are there ninjas? Are they robotic ninjas? Where have you been the last seven years? When did you gain magical superpowers? Why did you change your name to Gemini? Sounds pretty foofy if you ask me. Also, have you been following me around this whole time? Because that's pretty weird considering last time I saw you was when you dumped me for absolutely no reason.  BARRISTA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You guys used to date? Nice.  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hardly.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh try all of 8th grade!  BARRISTA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Burn.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lucy BUILDS a barrier between the front and back seats. 25.   BARRISTA (MUFFLED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How do you do that?  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: By the way, I'm seeing someone now, so don't get any ideas.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I never have any ideas.

dialogues.speaker: SIRENS
dialogues.text: EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, thank goodness, the police are here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The cops start to shoot at them.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Never mind.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now the cops are chasing them while they chase Doris! Dozens. Blues Brothers meets Freebie and the Bean, only when these cars crash, they break into LEGO PIECES!  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You don't get it, do you?  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get what?  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're here for the Chosen One.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Chosen One? What the heck is that? Wait, you mean me?! I keep telling everyone- I'm just a regular guy!  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not you. Your mom.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh. Really?

dialogues.speaker: BARRISTA, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: Ha ha, burn.  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I was sent to get her, but they got to her first. 26.   EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're sure I'm not the Chosen One?  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Emmet, your mother is the most powerful being in the universe.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But-- how-- she has cankles!  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't we all.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The two cars fly off an OVERPASS and land on a MOVING EL TRAIN that goes all through LEGOPOLIS. It's a car chase on a moving train... IN 3D!  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She and I belong to an ancient brotherhood of MasterBuilders, who create from our imaginations, not instructions, forced underground by evil forces. She has long been in hiding to protect you from those forces. I was sent to summon her, but when I showed up she was too busy breaking you out of prison.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This sinks in.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay I did not understand a lot of that.  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just hold the wheel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lucy jumps out the window and goes out onto the tether.  BARRISTA (MUFFLED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So. What's happening?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is insane. And they are running out of train. Lucy gets onto the ninja car. Smashes the window. The ninjas beat on her. She tries to take the car apart to build a weapon but it's somehow STUCK TOGETHER! 27.   LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How... Emmet! Jump!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: At the last possible second, Lucy jumps off the car. Emmet jumps out of his car. The ninja car flies off the end of the train and through a BUILDING. Nothing happens to the Viking car, but Lucy and Emmet's car SMASHES into a thousand pieces. They land with a THUD.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mom! I'm sorry. I'm so sorry.  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It didn't break. How?  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She's gone. I can't believe she's gone... because she tried to protect me...?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lucy pulls Emmet behind a DUMPSTER as the police arrive at the scene and COVER UP the hole in the wall.  BAD COP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Send everyone you can out hunting for that kid and whoever is trying to help him. You hear me?! (MENACING)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's wanted... broken or together.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lucy and Emmet run away. Larry the Barrista emerges from the rubble, unseen by the cops.  LARRY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I need a coffee.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He gets up and walks O.S., right past an open sewer grate where Emmet and Lucy once were.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Emmet and Lucy wade through the sewers.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who exactly are these evil forces my mom was trying to protect me from? And why are the cops in league with robot ninjas?  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You have a lot of questions. 28.   EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm just getting warmed up.  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They all work for the Black Falcon.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Black Falcon?  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Otherwise known as Rodrigo Falcone, the C.E.O. of Empura?  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Empura? I love their stuff.  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He is also the self-declared Emperor of all known LEGO realms. He kidnapped your mom because she is the only one who can stop him from destroying us all.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My mom. My mom?  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Emmet, did your mom have a safe deposit box, a safe, something where she would have hidden something very valuable?  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. The only thing she had that was worth anything was her purse. She takes it with her everywhere. Unfortunately it's now melted to my arm. Ow!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lucy yanks the purse towards her. She opens the purse and starts removing items. A lot of items. Like A LOT.  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (pulling out items) No...no...no...no...no...no... No...no...no...no...no...no...  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, I guess it's not in there--  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Finally, it's empty.  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's not in there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Emmet pulls it away. A RATTLE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lucy pulls Emmet back and finds a FALSE COMPARTMENT. In it is a lock box. It has a combination lock.  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's her birthday?  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: November twenty-second.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's not the combo.  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Of course. Your birthday. January six.  EMMET (TOUCHED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You remember?  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not by choice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lucy opens the case and lifts out the most beautiful thing they've ever seen: a single PIECE that has studs on all sides, and continually changes colors as if by magic.  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The MasterPiece.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is this thing? It's... beautiful.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They bask in its glow.  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Some say it's the first piece ever. No one knows exactly what it does, but it is said the Chosen One will use it to one day save the world.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And by that you mean my mom.  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's an inscription. 30.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There is an inscription. Etched all around it.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One will come from land afar, With hand besmirched in shape of star. One to confront a great forsaker, And build a bridge to meet the Maker. This one will make the world right, But first there'll be an awesome fight.  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The prophecy of the Chosen One...  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who is my Mom.  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes. We have to get this to your mom so she can fulfill her destiny and stop the Black Falcon before he destroys us all.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And if it weren't for me, she'd be here and everything would be okay.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lucy doesn't say anything. It's her way of saying "Yes."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Emmet goes up to the MasterPiece, upset. He touches it, feeling sorry for himself. The second Emmet touches it... WHAM!!!!  SMASH TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A fuzzy vision of strange creatures. Are they... HUMAN? We see them very close up. As though the cameraman were a minifig. And he were underwater.  CREATURE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Finn? I thought I told you not to touch anything...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Emmet lets go, catching his breath. The purse is now free from his hand. 31.   EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What was that?  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What was what?

dialogues.speaker: SFX
dialogues.text: LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We have to go. NOW.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: COPS enter the sewer. Emmet puts the MasterPiece back in his mom's purse and wears it like a backpack. Lucy and Emmet dash out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A FOOTCHASE ENSUES between the cops and Lucy and Emmet. Lucy uses her powers to dash through buildings and shops and lose the cops, breaking apart walls and rebuilding them behind her. Emmet keeps up, barely.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where are we going?!  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're going to take the MasterPiece to someone who can help.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The MasterBuilders council?  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. They're gone. All of them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She turns away, remembering. It's painful.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then who?  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vitruvius. He was once a great MasterBuilder, now he's...retired. But he's our only hope.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can't you do it on your own? You were all like, heh-hoo-hiya!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Emmet lamely imitates her quickbuild kung-fu.  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't, I'm...still in training. I'm not a full-fledged MasterBuilder yet. Technically, I'm an intern. 32.   EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well well well--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The cops are closing in. They turn around a blind corner and run smack into...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's a big sign that tells us "CITY LIMITS. NO EXIT/NO ENTRY." And a literal line across the ground. Emmet stops short of the line.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're not going to cross the city limits, are you?  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't be a putz, Emmet.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everyone knows you're not allowed to go Out of Town. It's dangerous, uncharted and no one should ever go that's what everybody says. Can't we just explain the situation to President Iamnotarobot?  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Iamnotarobot is one of the Black Falcon's robot henchmen. Ever notice how metallic he looks?  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on. He's just very fair skinned. It says "Iamnotarobot" in his very name! Besides, he's way better than Councilman Strawman. That guy is the pits.  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't be naГЇve.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's naГЇve?  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She steps across the line. Emmet GASPS for a long time.  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look, just give me the MasterPiece and I'll take it from here. 33.   EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My mom gave it to me and I'm not giving it to anyone unless their name is My Mom.  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well then I guess you're going to have to cross that line.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well then I guess I am.  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well then go ahead and do it.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well then go ahead and do it I shall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Beat. We can hear the cops and their DOGS BARKING.  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dude!  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, okay.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Emmet deliberately and meaningfully, in super slow motion, crosses the line. He EXHALES DRAMATICALLY. Takes another step. Then another, then-- SLAM!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Emmet has walked straight into an INVISIBLE WALL! Camera COMES AROUND revealing a trompe l'oeil painting on bricks that go up as far as the eye can see.  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not everything is what it seems...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lucy reveals an odd-shaped DEPRESSION in the wall. She takes apart a nearby VENDING MACHINE and rearranges the pieces into the shape of the depression, puts it in, filling the negative space...and it opens a door. Lucy pulls Emmet into the door and into...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A TUNNEL OF LIGHT - just like at the beginning of the movie. It seems peaceful, until we see that Emmet and Lucy are hurtling towards a monolithic wall. They BLAST THROUGH IT and into...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A beautiful, breathtaking place that looks like LEGO New Zealand. It's beautiful. Until... 34.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lucy and Emmet crash land into a bunch of HOBBIT HOUSES. They get out of the ship and look around. They see a lot of hobbits yelling at them for destroying their shire.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who are those guys?  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Annoying short whiners. Plus they reproduce like crazy. It's a real problem.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where are we? Where are all the buildings? And coffee shops?  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Legopolis is only one realm in the Black Falcon's dominion. He built walls around all of them so he can keep them separate. If the walls came down, he'd have a hard time controlling the results. The MasterBuilders built secret passages through the walls so we could travel between lands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A SCARY NOISE. The Hobbits scurry into their houses. Emmet and Lucy get down just before an army of robots riding robo-horses marches by.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who are they?  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Black Falcon's sentries. They're looking for us.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So he controls all these worlds?  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shh!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A robot turns its head. Almost spots them, then moves away. Lucy bonks Emmet on the head and they dash away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An evil volcano with a slick office tower rising out of it. A big Bauhaus cork holding back inordinate power. 35.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Doris is strung up in the rubber band, and now also chains and strapped to a board.  ASSISTANT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Black Falcon will see you now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Guards wheel her into...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The office of the worst boss you've ever had. Doris lunges at him but is restrained by her shackles.  BLACK FALCON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Doris! Did someone get you a water?  DORIS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You'll never get away with this.  BLACK FALCON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "You'll never get away with this!" What a clichГ©! You don't even know what it is I'm trying to get away with. Maybe you should listen more.  DORIS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm all ears.  BLACK FALCON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Truly? Because listening and hearing are not the same thing.  DORIS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm listening.  BLACK FALCON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Excellent. (THEN)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Behold, the Kragle!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Doris GASPS as BF unveils the sarcophagus we saw earlier. A Robot Ninja opens it. Inside is a TUBE OF KRAZY GLUE with some of the letters rubbed off to spell "KRA__GL_E."  DORIS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The car in the city. That's why it didn't break... 36.   BLACK FALCON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Very good. But there's a lot more to my plan than that. Check it:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Black Falcon saunters over to a STAGE SET, with a life- sized DIORAMA with living minifigs playing out a residential tableau.  BLACK FALCON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Here is your typical family. You there. Move your arm a little higher. A little higher... NO NO NO that's too high!!! Ugh you are all PATHETIC LOSERS!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Dad puts his arm down slightly.  BLACK FALCON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Perfect! Wonderful. Don't move an inch. You see how hard it is for me? I have to make all these plans and rules and enforce them on people. It's whack-a-mole. I get one thing perfect, and then another thing gets messed up. Ay ay ay I get so tired!  DORIS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You never did understand the way of the Maker.  BLACK FALCON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sure I do. There's one right way to do everything, and I know it, and everyone else is wrong and is trying to screw me up! Until now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Some NinjaVikings lower the Kragle into a cool looking KRAGLE CANNON, operated by a ninjaviking in a helmet. The cannon whirs to life, directed at the diorama.  BLACK FALCON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You. Introduce yourselves to me.  "DAD"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sorry?  BLACK FALCON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Like, you say to me "Hello Black Falcon, I'm Dale, and this is my wife Mary and our children Mark and Lisa." 37.   "DAD"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But you just said it.  BLACK FALCON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, just-- you say it now.  "DAD"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hello Black Falcon, I'm Dale, this IS MARY--  BLACK FALCON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My wife Mary.  "DAD" (BEAT)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My wife, Mary.  BLACK FALCON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And our children...  "DAD"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And our kids--  BLACK FALCON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Children.  "DAD"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And our children Mark and Lisa.  BLACK FALCON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All together now.  "DAD"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: < SIGH > Hello Black Falcon I'm Dale, this is my wife Mary and our children Mark and Lisa.  BLACK FALCON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, hello, Dale, Mary, Mark and Lisa. I'm Black Falcon, and I'm very FREEZE TO MEET YOU!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He points to the operator, who pulls a lever on the Cannon, which ZAPS them with KRAZY GLUE, freezing them!  BLACK FALCON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Exactly how I planned! BAHAHAHA! And it's totally permanent!  DORIS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You want to do this to the whole world? 38.   BLACK FALCON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So the whole world will be exactly how I want.  DORIS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But-- I'll never see my son again. No mother will ever see her son.  BLACK FALCON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Unless they're frozen when they happen to be looking at each other, exactly. Oh Doris, I'm so glad we could finally meet again, after all these years.  DORIS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do you want from me?  BLACK FALCON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Isn't it obvious? I want you to make me a better Kragle-Thingy!  DORIS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's really dumb.  BLACK FALCON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I mean this works okay, but it doesn't have a wide enough spray. I need to make like a big cloud of sticky mist. And it's not scary enough. And I hate the color.  DORIS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You'll never get aw-- You'll not achieve that which you have just described!  BLACK FALCON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What, do you think your pathetic son is going to save you or something? He can't even put two bricks together.  DORIS (LYING)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've trained him. Secretly.  BLACK FALCON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did you? I think you protected him. Because you were afraid to have him live under the spectre of being found out. Of being hunted. You wanted him to fit in. To feel normal, isn't that right? 39.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Doris can't look at him. BF shows her a poster with a goofy image of Emmet. "Wanted: Broken or Together."  BLACK FALCON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Big mistake, Doris. Thanks to that call, he's going to get his butt kicked. He'll fit in, alright. Into a coffin!  DORIS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leave him out of this!  BLACK FALCON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I would, but I'm pretty sure he has the MasterPiece. It wasn't in your apartment, and it's not on you. But your son seems to have interesting taste in handbags.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He grabs a LEGO MAGNIFYING GLASS from his desk and shows Doris the out-of-focus PURSE Emmet's holding in the Wanted photo.  BLACK FALCON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So, just to tie up all the loose ends, I'll have to kill him and take the MasterPiece so the prophecy will never come true.  DORIS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No! Don't, please! I'll do what you want, please don't hurt him.  BLACK FALCON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, don't worry, dear. You'll do what I want regardless. I'll simply use my very special electromagnetic machine to extract your thoughts and steal your ideas like I've done for all the other imprisoned MasterBuilders.  DORIS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No!  BLACK FALCON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes. Send her to the THINK TANK!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Doris struggles, the guards take her away. 40.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They come upon a majestic canyon with an immense LEGO waterfall (clear pieces tumbling down). Lucy climbs up the rock wall. Emmet follows.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is it much farther?  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you ever say something that isn't a stupid question?  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's that supposed to mean?  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I guess not.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Two-thirds up the canyon wall is a ledge with a cave behind the waterfall. And a sign. "Beware of Dragon." Gulp.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: YAPYAPYAP! DRAGON, a nasty yippy DOG startles them.  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's Dragon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lucy knocks on the door of a garishly painted SHACK.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who could live here?  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A blind man.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A homeless-looking man opens the door, facing the wrong direction. This is VITRUVIUS, Ben Kenobi meets Mr. Magoo meets Gandalf meets Columbo.  VITRUVIUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hello! What? Hi!  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I see.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Looks like it was decorated by a blind man. And it was. Vitruvius opens the shades, revealing a window view of a rock wall. 41.   EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lovely place.  VITRUVIUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you. I am deprived of my sight, but my hearing is so acute that I can still perceive the physical world using echolocation.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Like an old bat...  VITRUVIUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Precisely. I see with my ears. Now, how can I help you, extremely tall and fat stranger?  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My mother has been kidnapped and it's all my fault.  VITRUVIUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mmm...Hard pass. Not interested.  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: His mother is the Chosen One. I was sent to summon her. The Black Falcon got to her first. He has the Kragle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vitruvius stops.  VITRUVIUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh my. That is grave news indeed. But I'm afraid I'm retired. I'm sure the active MasterBuilders are more than adequate.  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The other MasterBuilders are gone.  VITRUVIUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I guess I'm not redundant anymore.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why is he being so weird?  VITRUVIUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Black Falcon was my student.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A STYLIZED 2D LEGO FLASHBACK tells his story: 42.

dialogues.speaker: VITRUVIUS, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: He was clever and smart. It was the age of the MasterBuilders. The world was a fluid, creative place. The most gifted were enrolled in MasterBuilder High School...  TEEN DORIS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey Rod. What's that?

dialogues.speaker: TEEN BLACK FALCON
dialogues.text: An awesome secret lair, b'doy! It's the best thing I've ever built. It's perfect. All I need now is a cool nickname.

dialogues.speaker: VITRUVIUS, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: I only aimed to teach him a lesson about the impermanence of creation.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LESS OLD VITRUVIUS pulls out a cornerstone brick in the lair and the whole thing topples over.

dialogues.speaker: TEEN BLACK FALCON
dialogues.text: No! My precious precious work!

dialogues.speaker: LESS OLD VITRUVIUS
dialogues.text: Building is rebuilding, Rodrigo. You must learn to embrace the practice, not the outcome.

dialogues.speaker: TEEN BLACK FALCON
dialogues.text: What a bunch of bunk! That thing was AWESOME!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We see his animated metamorphosis from teen to the Black Falcon of today.

dialogues.speaker: VITRUVIUS, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: He became enraged. Instead of improving his work, it became stagnant and weak. He began to amass power, and hunt down MasterBuilders. Harvesting their ideas. Forcing them to write instructions for him. Instructions that he in turn forced on the world. The remaining MasterBuilders went into hiding. I was encouraged to retire.  END FLASHBACK
VITRUVIUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They were probably right.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You taught my parents...  VITRUVIUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your mother went into hiding to protect you. Your father never had a chance...  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vitruvius, you can still help us.  VITRUVIUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's flattery, my dear. We both know you're only here because you have no other place to go.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're here because we don't know what to do and you might. Sir, all I've ever wanted was to get along with everyone and be a part of the world and now I don't know if there's going to be a world to be a part of. That is, unless you help me fix it. And I bet if you do, they'll forget all about what they used to think of you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This gets Vitruvius' attention.  VITRUVIUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I wish I could, young man, but he has the Kragle, and he has the Chosen One, and if he has the Chosen One, he has the MasterPiece. And without that, there is no--  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hope?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lucy holds out the MasterPiece. This changes the game. Vitruvius walks reverently towards it. Then past it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vitruvius has created a chart to explain his plan.  VITRUVIUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Kragle is the most powerful relic of the Maker. 44.   EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who is this Maker you guys keep talking about?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Emmet and Lucy sit at a "table." AKA a pink ERASER.  VITRUVIUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Maker. The being who put us all together and watches over us. Only by following the inspiration of the Maker can one become a true MasterBuilder.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay that sounds super weird.  VITRUVIUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It is, but then all the best things are.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And what's the Kragle again?  VITRUVIUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Every so often, the Maker drops a piece down to us that is unique, unlike any other. This crystal table is but one example. Some of them, in the wrong hands, can be weaponized. The Kragle, if harnessed, could--  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --destroy the world?  VITRUVIUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes. The Black Falcon has taken your mother, the one person who can stop him, and imprisoned her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He gestures to a map. For once it's what he says it is, but as he's talking, he points to the wrong places. Lucky for us, the camera follows the map correctly.  VITRUVIUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If we can travel across sea and land, penetrate his heavily- guarded fortress, unkidnap Master Doris, and bring the MasterPiece safely to her, she can use it to destroy the Kragle, and set the world right. 45.   EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh is that all we have to do? That doesn't sound too hard. Oh wait, I forgot to mention, I am saying this with a sarcastic inflection.  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's super constructive, thank you.  VITRUVIUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We need to assemble a team of all remaining MasterBuilders hiding throughout the lands. We'll scour the countryside high and low, overturning rocks, hiding from sentries, avoiding the major roads and air..  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We don't have that kind of time!  VITRUVIUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Or we could send out a mass email to the MasterBuilders list, and have whichever ones are remaining meet us at the midpoint.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Better.  VITRUVIUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And then, we sail for the Land of Unused Parts! (THEN)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anybody got a ship?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A bustling colonial-era port, but with every possible kind of ship, from aircraft carrier to canoe. Emmet, Lucy, Vitruvius, and Dragon sneak down a DOCK disguised as FISHERMEN. Dragon is disguised as a FISH.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How long has your boyfriend had his own ship?  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why do you care? 46.   EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I just think it's interesting that you're attracted to someone with his own vessel. Fairly superficial to date a guy with his own yacht.  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's not exactly a yacht.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They come upon a really cool PIRATE SHIP. NECKBEARD, a pirate, sticks his head through a porthole in the ship.  NECKBEARD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ahoy! Welcome to the Sea Cow!  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Huh. Not what I expected.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Neckbeard hops out onto the dock, revealing he HAS NO BODY. He's just a head. And a beard.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Really not what I expected.  NECKBEARD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Arr! Come give your weary boyfriend a kiss!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She does.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Neckbeard and Lucy begin MAKING OUT.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay. That's-- okay.  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gosh, where are my manners? Emmet, this is Neckbeard, my boyfriend. Neckbeard, this is Emmet. We used to date a million zillion years ago. It meant nothing to me. You have heard of Vitruvius, of course.  NECKBEARD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're the teacher that made the Black Falcon who he is, then?  VITRUVIUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That was a long time ago. 47.   NECKBEARD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Farrr be it for a pirate to judge a man with an unsavory reputation.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's surprisingly gracious--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly, Neckbeard somehow gets up in Emmet's grill.  NECKBEARD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stay away from me lady.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alright. Sure.  NECKBEARD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Say that to my face.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alright. Sure.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He gets somehow closer to Emmet. Mouths almost touching.  NECKBEARD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I was once the most feared MasterBuilder in all the lands. I lost the rest of me body fighting off a hundred of the Black Falcon's men. You cross me, and I'll make it an even fight, if you follow.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you for your clarity.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Neckbeard slowly hops back past, eyeing Emmet the whole time. Emmet looks to Lucy: "How can you be with him?"  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He has an incredible mind.  NECKBEARD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everyone hop aboard. Meet me crew. This be Orangebeard, Brownbeard and Nobeard, and me First Mate, Chewbacca. You can call him Allbeard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As they board the ship and meet the ragtag crew including Chewbacca, the BAD COP from 20 pages ago watches them from the dock, comparing Emmet to his WANTED POSTER. 48.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Sea Cow sails across a sea made entirely of LEGO. Waves animating with thousands and thousands of LEGO bricks-- if the audiences have reassembled their minds from being blown before, they just got blown again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Neckbeard pores over a chart explaining their heading to Lucy and Vitruvius. Emmet swabs the deck.  NECKBEARD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The route be stuffed to the gills with Empura shipping activity. It's heavily patrolled. We'll have to be keeping an eye open, and when the time be right, make ourrrr move.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's our move?  NECKBEARD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sorry, did the Captain say you could finish swabbing the deck?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The boat rocks back and forth. Emmet, LITERALLY GREEN, approaches Vitruvius who's MEDITATING while building a crazy mecha bird. Like those adorable creatures in Batteries Not Included.  VITRUVIUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lucy. Welcome.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's Emmet.  VITRUVIUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ah. You got your sea legs, yet?  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes. What are you doing?  VITRUVIUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Making.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's it for? 49.   VITRUVIUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is anything for? It's what we were all meant to do. What the Maker has fated us to do.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, here's what I don't get. If our lives really are predetermined by some all-controlling dude, what is the point of doing anything?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vitruvius punches Emmet in the face.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: OW! Why did you do that?!  VITRUVIUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Maker fated me to.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Or you did it yourself because you're a crazy person.  VITRUVIUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ah. Now, you're learning.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Emmet stares at him for a minute, confused. Then he looks at the mecha-bird, impressed.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I could just never make something like that. How did you even get the idea?  VITRUVIUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I didn't. I just opened a window for it to fly through.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Emmet pets the mechabird with a real sense of wonder.  VITRUVIUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Birds are, incidentally, one of the most creative of all the animals. They build nests. Create elaborate courtship rituals, make gifts for one another. And of course, their beautiful songs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It emits a PIERCING ALARM CLOCK NOISE.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Teach me. 50.   VITRUVIUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Open your throat and make a  sound.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. Teach me to do what you do.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vitruvius smiles. But it's bittersweet.  VITRUVIUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How can I teach you something you already know? It's already inside you. You've walled it up, but it still shines through. That terrific disaster you caused at the instruction site? That was no accident.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not sure I follow...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vitruvius points up to the night sky.  VITRUVIUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They say every night the Maker puts a blanket over the world, a blanket with tiny holes. Some call them stars, but I call them MakerPeepers.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MakerPeepers?  VITRUVIUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MakerPeepers. Emmet, there was a time, before you were born, when making new things came as naturally to everyone as breathing. The world was messy and wild, and that made it beautiful. But then, everything became rigid and prefabricated, so everyone just stopped thinking of new things. Making has been outsourced to Empura. The Black Falcon has paved over the world that was.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vitruvius indicates the sky.  VITRUVIUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And yet, somehow, light still shines through the cracks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The mechabird flies out a porthole. Emmet runs after it. 51.   EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh no! Wait! (THEN)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It got out...  VITRUVIUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Isn't that marvelous? You have an idea, and then off it goes!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WE FOLLOW the mechabird soaring over the moonlit waves, and finally, past a VIKING SHIP manned by ROBOVIKINGS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's more high-tech than a normal Viking Ship. Lots of Empura Logos. Bad Cop stands next to a RoboViking Sentry.  BAD COP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's them. Man your weapons. Full steam ahead.  ROBOVIKING

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We don't use steam. We row.  BAD COP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fine. Full row ahead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Neckbeard looks through a SPYGLASS at the enemy ship.  NECKBEARD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're a-comin'! Dive!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vitruvius and Emmet come up from below decks. Lucy and Neckbeard begin to meditate together.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We go into LUCY'S MIND'S EYE: She is conceiving of new instructions. She can see every piece at once and is reforming them in her mind into something new. NECKBEARD'S MINDS EYE looks the same. Their two visions of the pieces combine!  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are they doing?  VITRUVIUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Collaborating. 52.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Their eyes open!  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vitruvius, follow my lead.  NECKBEARD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mateys! Be me hands and legs! Start taking the ship apart!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Neckbeard's pirate crewmembers, including Chewbacca, enthusiastically oblige.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But we'll sink!  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's the idea.  NECKBEARD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Put the four-piece over there. No! The skinny one. Come on!  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't get it-- What do I do?  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Build a hatch.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Like for an attic?  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Like for a submarine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lucy, Neckbeard, Vitruvius, all start rebuilding the ship into a BADASS SUBMARINE. This looks awesome as hell.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Emmet, exasperated, does his best to build a hatch. INTERCUT the others building quick and cool with Emmet unable to act creatively at all. Finally, in SLOW MOTION: Emmet puts two bricks together.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: At the last second, Lucy runs up to Emmet. All he's got is two pieces attached in a cross-bar.  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's as far as you got?!  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
