dialogues.text: She quick-builds a hatch, attaches his cross-bar, drags him inside, and spins the hatch shut, just as they DIVE below the waves. 53.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Like a classic sub interior, but manned by pirates. Neckbeard perches himself at the periscope, plugging into it using his head peg.  NECKBEARD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Heading?  CHEWBACCA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Arrrrrrrr.  NECKBEARD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get deeper. If we're too high their sensorrrs will detect us.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A ROBOVIKING among SOPHISTICATED EQUIPMENT sees nothing.  BAD COP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nothing? But they were right here.  ROBOVIKING

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait. There's something on the scanner.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: OVERHEAD SHOT: We watch the sub go underneath the ship.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NECKBEARD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dive! Dive! Dive!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PUSH IN as the radar scanner spins around slowly. Will it show a blip or not?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A bunch of RoboVikings stand at the ready, prepared to fire extensive weaponry any second. 54.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: UNDER THE SUB LOOKING UP: we can see the carrier far overhead in the moonlight, the sub in the foreground.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Our guys huddle, worried about being caught. A LONG BEAT.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROBOVIKING

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nothing. There's nothing.  BAD COP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let me see that... DAMMIT!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He hits the equipment, breaking some pieces off.  ROBOVIKING

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, watch it man, I built that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They did it! Emmet cheers with everyone, excited to be one of the guys. Lucy puts a hand on his shoulder. It's the first time anyone has really touched him since his mom was kidnapped. He smiles and looks out a porthole.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Emmet looks out at the water. He sees many beautiful LEGO fish, dolphins, and whales. It's just WONDEROUS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Emmet turns back to the group.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey Lucy, you gotta see--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He sees Lucy and Neckbeard making out again. When we cut back to Emmet, he's GREEN again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FOG. The sub surfaces. The hatch opens. Emmet runs out and WRETCHES into the ocean. Until he looks up to find: 55.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A TREASURE CHEST floating by. He hauls it onto the deck. Opens it to find what you and I would call a KEYRING with a LASER POINTER. Emmet touches the ring.  EMMET'S VISION:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's a little clearer now. Imagine human beings but made out of thousands of LEGO bricks, shot through a shower door covered in soap scum.  GROWN UP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where are my dang keys? Finn, have you been playing in here?  KID

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.  GROWN UP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You sound like you are lying. Are you lying?  KID

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.  GROWN UP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, this is my very special area, where I play with something VERY NOT-ABLE-TO-BE-TOUCHED-BY-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: anyone, because it is the most awesome thing I have ever made.  KID

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uncle Ted, why don't you have a girlfriend?  GROWN UP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Because you need money for girlfriends. Although they refuse to admit that. Although they admit it implicitly when they leave you for a banker.  KID

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why don't you have a job?  GROWN UP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look, you can do anything you want with this big bin of parts, okay? Just promise me you aren't going to play in my special areas anymore.  KID

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay. 56.   GROWN UP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is that a real okay or a fake one?  KID

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Real.  GROWN UP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay. That's my man.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The grown-up EXITS. After a beat, we see a giant HAND coming towards the camera.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EMMET WAKES UP! He drops the ring in shock. Then he puts it in his purse-backpack.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He looks at the ocean water and watches its composition change as RANDOM COLORED PARTS begin to intermingle with the water, like the confluence of two rivers. He looks out to the horizon and sees he has just entered a SEA OF UNUSED PARTS. At its center is an ISLAND covered in fog.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The others have come on deck to take in the sight. The fog clears, revealing an island with huge cliffs and a KRAZY KASTLE with a fantastically fortified WALL.  VITRUVIUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Legotopia. The last free kingdom in the universe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vitruvius is looking the wrong way. Lucy turns him in the right direction.  VITRUVIUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's so creative - different from the other architecture we've seen. Our heroes knock on the big wacky door.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Does the Black Falcon know about this place?  VITRUVIUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's been hidden for ages by the fog and its remote location. Plus they have elaborate security measures. 57.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: From the door emerges a silly LEGO face.  DOOR FACE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who goes there?  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, uh, I'm Emmet. This is my ex- girlfriend Lucy, also a blind man, a pirate head, and a loud dog. We're here to save the world.  DOOR FACE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, I've never heard of you, but come on in!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The door opens.  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's the security?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They stroll easily into a FANTASTICAL WONDERLAND...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's a cross between The Point, Yellow Submarine, Terry Gilliam's sketchbook, and a medieval castle. All manner of bizarre creatures roam about. It's like looking into a child's brain: wonderous and fluid and nonsensical.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: KRAZY KING KARL, a weird combination of disparate mini- figs arrives, riding a DINO-ROCKET.  KING KARL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hi! I'm Karl, and Welcome to my Krazy Kastle. Krazy with a K!  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: For Kreativity...  KING KARL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Exaktly!  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why did you build all this stuff?  KING KARL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well...Why not?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MUSIC: An original song called "Why Not?" in which KING KARL explains that when your kreativity is truly free, anything can happen. Yep, we're doing a Willy Wonka-style

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: KING KARL shows them around his krazy kingdom! Each wacky environment is packed with Krazy Kreatures.  KING KARL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If you can conceive it, we will achieve it. Build anything whenever you feel it.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know we really don't have time--  KING KARL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Invent a game, like Roller Cricket. Or buy Bullfighting Tennis tickets...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A bunch of bulls chase tennis players as they hit back and forth. They watch from a box as a bull knocks down one of the players.  KING KARL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just wide!  NECKBEARD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is me favorite sport.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Filled with nonsensical charts and weird animals misspelling basic words on oddly-shaped chalkboards.  KING KARL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We only teach art and music in school so kids feel unencumbered. No spelling, reading, science or math, we just make up all the numbers!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It looks like an M.C. Escher drawing come to life.  KING KARL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Make any idea thought or spoken. Rules were meant to be broken! 59.   EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, rules were meant to be followed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Happy artsy citizens and animals and weird morphy rocks and trees all gather for a BIG FINALE!  CHORUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We have everything and nothing and something's all we've got. Why, you ask? What you should ask is... Why not?!!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The finish. Emmet is pretty overwhelmed.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You guys are really weird.  KING KARL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cool, man, thank you.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is crazy. You can't have a society without rules. I mean, your castle doesn't look very structurally sound at all!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He gestures to the structurally unsound Kastle, which is is built on a single swirly stilt and looks like a giant teetering Mobius Strip with turrets.  KING KARL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who is this guy?  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Emmet. He doesn't get out much.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vitruvius pulls a frustrated Emmet aside.  VITRUVIUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Emmet, these people are not MasterBuilders. They do not create with purpose, they create just to create. But they can also be very inspiring, because the only way to accomplish the impossible is to break the rules of what is possible.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I wish that made sense to me. 60.   VITRUVIUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It will if you let it. (turning to Karl) King Karl, I wish we came to you with better news.  KING KARL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As do I. The others arrived just before you, which gave us a chance to rehearse the song. Follow me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The King leads them into a LOTR-style room, with a long table filled with a bounty of food.  NECKBEARD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ar! What a bounty! I be starrrving!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Neckbeard hops onto the table and gorges himself. Also, we should mention that everything Neckbeard eats or drinks goes right down his throat and onto the floor. Yuck. Emmet gives Lucy a look. After a beat:  KING KARL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Meet your team.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: At the other end of the hall stand BATMAN, a famous masked crime-fighter; DUPLO, an old-school Duplo figure; and BENNY, a spaceman.  BATMAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, I'm Batman. Got the email. On my Batphone. Which I invented. Gets emails. On a phone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He waits for them to be impressed, then steps back.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hello.  DUPLO

dialogues.speaker: DUPLO
dialogues.text: LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And where do you come from?  DUPLO

dialogues.speaker: DUPLO
dialogues.text: LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay. Um, he's a MasterBuilder? 61.   KING KARL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. But he wants to help.  DUPLO

dialogues.speaker: DUPLO HELP
dialogues.text: BATMAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm a MasterBuilder. I built a lot of gadgets. Want to see my gadgets?  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No thank you.  BENNY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm also a MasterBuilder.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cool!  BENNY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm Benny. Benny "Blue" Chu. Where are you from? I'm from space. There's not a lot of oxygen up there. One time I was fixing my ship in space and there was a crack in my helmet. They say I should've died or gotten Space Madness but I didn't die. I'm here, right? Ha ha! Have you seen my spaceship? I rebuilt it but it doesn't fly for some reason.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He points out the window to an odd, unstable-looking SPACESHIP, which is parked outside.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Um, maybe if it didn't have two fronts and no back, and it didn't have five wings.  BENNY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I love wings. Wings are great, right?  NECKBEARD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He seems a little distracted.  BENNY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What? Where?  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is this everyone? 62.   BENNY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, no. There's one more. My co- pilot Moppy. He's really organized.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Benny holds a Mop.  BENNY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hi Moppy. (MOPPY VOICE)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hi everybody. Did you meet my friend Benny? He's the best. (REGULAR VOICE)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's too nice of you, Mopper. (MOPPY VOICE)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He can really help you with your quest. (REGULAR VOICE)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, I don't know. (MOPPY VOICE)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He gets real lonely sometimes. (REGULAR VOICE)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Moppy! (MOPPY VOICE)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's true. He was all alone in space. He tried to look for his space friends but couldn't find them. No one is left but me. Him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BEAT. He looks so sad and lonely.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What did you say you do again?  BENNY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, I'm a Space Cadet. First Class.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ah.  VITRUVIUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We are all that remain of the once proud society of MasterBuilders. Except for Duplo. And Emmet. He's not a MasterBuilder, he's just the son of one. And Lucy, who is still an intern.  BATMAN (INTRIGUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hello. 63.   VITRUVIUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Along with a blind man, a pirate head, a crazy spaceman, and Batman...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Emmet pulls out the MasterPiece. They all marvel at it.  VITRUVIUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Together, we form a fellowship of the MasterPiece. A shining beacon of possibility, and the only thing that can counteract the power of the Kragle. If we can get this into the hands of the Chosen One--

dialogues.speaker: VOICE, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: Freeze!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: REVEAL Bad Cop and his men! Guns trained.  BAD COP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Or didn't you know that as a former student of MasterBuilder academy, the Black Falcon was cc'd on your mass email?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He takes the MasterPiece and cuffs everyone else. Behind the cops and vikings stands a sheepish King Karl.  KING KARL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sorry, I had to let them in.  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: King Karl! You betrayed us! You betrayed everything you stand for!  KING KARL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tsk, I know. Turns out Legotopia had run up like a bunch of debt. Something about lots of spending and no revenue. Empura promised to fund the whole place. Honestly, I'm super sorry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They all struggle but the Ninjavikes are too much.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This guy is supposed to be inspiring? More like conspiring... with a bunch of mean jerks who have my mom! You're just as bad as them, you big mean jerk! 64.   KING KARL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on. Guys.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everyone looks at him real angry. Karl feels really guilty, and watches them get led out at gunpoint.  KING KARL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where are you taking them? Not to the dungeon, right? You said--  BAD COP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do I look like a medieval constable? No, they're going someplace much worse. Take them to... the conference room!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A medieval, dungeon-like conference room. Outside its glass walls, there are fruity creatures walking around. Everyone is there but King Karl.

dialogues.speaker: ASSISTANT, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: I have the Black Falcon for you...  BAD COP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay we're good to teleconference.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He turns on a TELECONFERENCING DEVICE. It doesn't work very well. To start, the image is a closeup of BF's neck.

dialogues.speaker: THE BLACK FALCON, (O.C.)
dialogues.text: Well, well, well. Looks like I have you right-- All I'm seeing is a wall. Should I turn it? You turn it. Turn it around. Is this the volume? WELL WHICH ONE IS THE

dialogues.speaker: VOLUME
dialogues.text: OH THERE IT GOES! Can you hear me? How about now? How about now? How

dialogues.speaker: NOW
dialogues.text: ABOUT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everyone jumps out of their seats. Yow that's loud.  BAD COP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just, point the camera at you.

dialogues.speaker: THE BLACK FALCON
dialogues.text: I can't see anything. 65.   BAD COP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, the other way. There. That's close enough.

dialogues.speaker: THE BLACK FALCON
dialogues.text: Oh I see you! I see your hand. Wave your hand. Ha ha! This is amazing! Do you hear a weird echo on your end? I can hear myself but like two seconds later. Echo. Echo. This is my voiceeeeeoooooo aaaaayyyyyyyeeeeeeeeeee...  BAD COP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir.

dialogues.speaker: THE BLACK FALCON
dialogues.text: Okay. Well well well, it looks like I have you all right where I want you. Good morning Vitruvius.  VITRUVIUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Black Falcon! Prepare to meet the Maker!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vitruvius lunges with his staff at the screen.  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No no he's just on teleconference.  VITRUVIUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's like a phone. A telegram. He's not actually in the room.  VITRUVIUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Like a crystal ball?  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sure.

dialogues.speaker: THE BLACK FALCON
dialogues.text: Still being schooled by your students, I see.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This hurts.

dialogues.speaker: THE BLACK FALCON
dialogues.text: I thought you might want to know that my good friend Doris here is safe and sound, so you don't have anything to worry about. 66.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He pushes a button, switching cameras to Doris, who is tied in a big machine with a tube strapped to her head. She looks tired. Some of the life drained out of her.  DORIS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Emmet!  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mom! I'm coming! I won't let you down. Any more than I already have!

dialogues.speaker: THE BLACK FALCON
dialogues.text: You've done enough, haven't you sonny? After all, your mother is now a distinguished member of my

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reveal the THINK TANK - an enormous aquarium of MasterBuilders hooked up to brain squeezers which suck the ideas right out of their heads. Including Doris.

dialogues.speaker: THE BLACK FALCON
dialogues.text: Every MasterBuilder in the world is in this tank, having their ideas extracted. Now, with the ideas of the Chosen One, I can finally build the best Kraglethingy in the world, freeze everything, and make the universe exactly how I like it forever.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mom! No!

dialogues.speaker: THE BLACK FALCON
dialogues.text: There's nothing you can do, dude. I already have the ideas. My builders are putting the finishing touches right now. What are you going to show up here in the next twenty four hours and stop me? You just gave me the only hope you had! You see this?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He gestures to a mini-model of all his lands. It takes up substantial floor space.  BLACK FALCON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: These are all the lands I control! They are perfect! And they are going to be that way forever! Now that you can't mess any of them up! Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha! 67.   LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So wait. What was the purpose of this call then?

dialogues.speaker: THE BLACK FALCON
dialogues.text: To gloat. Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha PEACE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bad Cop and his support team are marching our guys through an underground parking lot. They open a door to a squad car, but guess who's inside? King Karl!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He kicks open the door and smashes Bad Cop's hand in it. He does some creative building and kicks everyone's butts. He frees our heroes.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're a MasterBuilder, too?  KING KARL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I dabble. You were right. I'd rather be poor and free than comfortable and stuck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They grab the MasterPiece and run away.  BAD COP (INTO CB)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Back up! Repeat. I need back up.  KING KARL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bring it on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They run up the stairs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sirens. Dozens of cop cars pull up, along with Robo- Vikings, Skeletons, EVIL MERMEN emerging out of the sea, and the VIKING SHIP FROM BEFORE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: King Karl and the others burst in from the stairwell.  KING KARL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Prepare for battle! 68.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All the whimsical creatures and citizens go steely and man battle stations. All manner of fantastical weapons, formidable looking creatures. Knights, cool-ass cars, every crazy looking thing a kid would think of for a war.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tension mounts on both sides of the wall.  KING KARL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On my mark.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BAD COP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (into C.B.) Charge.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: KING KARL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Charge!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: OUTSIDE THE WALL: The bad guys rush to the wall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: OVERHEAD: The two armies rush towards one another.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cannonballs and flames emerge from the bad guy's weapons, and from the good guys: Puppies. And flowers. Anything but an effective ballistic.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And it's a MASSACRE. The fruity forces of King Karl are just no match. Their vehicles don't drive. The bows and arrows shoot in curly cues. They are just impossibly overmatched. It's an instant rout.  KING KARL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Retreat!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chaos invades the kingdom. Our heroes scramble to find a way out as cop cars and RoboVikings burst through the Kastle walls.  KING KARL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You have to go.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We can't leave you here.  KING KARL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's my place to be here. Go!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bad Cop bursts out the stairwell into the Kourtyard and chases after our guys. 69.   BENNY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everyone get in my spaceship!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just then, Bad Cop pulls the bottom piece out of the Unstable Kastle and the whole Kastle tips over, and CRUSHES Benny's spaceship to pieces. KABOOM!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Beat.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Over there!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He points to a huge CATAPULT. They all grab pieces of Benny's demolished ship and the Kastle, put them into the catapult and jump inside of it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They watch as King Karl tries to trip up Bad Cop, but falls to an attack of Skeletons. We watch him fall in SLOW MO... It's super sad, you guys.  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We have to go now!  DUPLO

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Duplo jumps up and just as Bad Cop arrives, STOMPS on the other end of the lever, FLINGING our heroes into the air along with all the remains of Benny's spaceship.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: IN MID AIR all the MasterBuilders mind-meld and quickbuild a ROCKET-COPTER around themselves with the remains of the spaceship. Emmet actually helps. He may be getting the hang of this. As they chopper-rocket off:  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I built that chair! Check it out. That's my chair. Pretty good.  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's far more impressive than this entire Rocket-Copter.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, it was my idea to get in the catapult.  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A credit hog. Great.  BATMAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where'd this thing come from?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We see R2D2 in the backseat. 70.   R2D2 < WHISTLES >  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No idea.  NECKBEARD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bogey on our six!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FIGHTER JETS PILOTED BY SKELETONS bear down on them! A really awesome DOGFIGHT ensues. Benny pilots, with Batman backseat driving, and Emmet manning the turrets.  BENNY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey look at that over there--  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Benny! Focus!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They manage to stay ahead of the bad guy planes and fly through another TROMPE L'OEIL WALL.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The planes follow! AWESOME! Neckbeard eyes the MAP.  NECKBEARD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Benny evades the planes and goes through a portal! YES!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Rocket-Copter crashes into the ground and breaks apart.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My chair!!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Our crew staggers out and looks at a haunting Old West Town. A LEGO tumbleweed passes by. In the distance we see the Volcano with Empura Tower inside. It's eerie.  BATMAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I say we camp here for the night in this creepy Old West Ghost Town.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All agree: "Sounds good to me," "Can't think of a better spot" etc. 71.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They've made a fire out of Moppy. Everyone sleeps. Neckbeard SNORES. Loud.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But Emmet can't sleep. He stares off at the volcano- tower where his mom is being held. Lucy approaches.  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's up?  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can't sleep. Kind of still upset about everything, you know?  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Upset about what?  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, I got in a fight with my mom that caused her to get kidnapped and the whole world is about to get frozen, if you must know, unless you were asking that sarcastically, which I now realize you were.  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sorry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She takes pity on him. Anyone would.  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We'll find her.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I hope so.  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know it. I know you.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I thought you said I didn't have a creative bone in my body.  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You don't.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's nice, thank you.  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm just trying to help. 72.   EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know what you are, Lucy?  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A real pain in the elbow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lucy LAUGHS.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You may not have a creative bone in your body, but you have a lot of really really earnest bones. You always did.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you?  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I mean, that day when we were kids, and you drew the face in art class, you inspired me. I thought maybe there was more out there in the world, and maybe you felt the same. That's why I asked you out. But then you ended up like everyone else and broke my heart, you know? That I was going one way and you didn't go with me.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Think of how I felt. My mom trained me to follow the herd. To lay low. All I ever wanted was to fit in, to have friends. And the funny thing is, maybe I was trying too hard, but, my whole life, I never did have any real friends.  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're being so dramatic. It was eighth grade!  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's the most dramatic time in anyone's life, right? It's what made The Black Falcon such a world class dingaling. 73.   LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It made a lot of us dingalings.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Emmet looks away, sad.  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know, whenever I doubt myself, I look into this prism I found long ago...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She pulls out a wadded-up metallic GUM WRAPPER.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's... beautiful.  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know. It's a relic of the Maker. When I'm feeling low, I look at it, and it always makes me feel like there still is beauty in the world, and we all have a purpose. You know what I mean?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He stares at it, then at her.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah. I do.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A long beat as they look at each other...  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, good night.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah. Okay.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Emmet sits alone, looking at his sparkly reflection in the gum wrapper. As he puts his hands on it:   EMMET'S VISION:

dialogues.speaker: BASEMENT...
dialogues.text: TED

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Finn? What did you do to the spaceship? It's in pieces! I told you not to play with this and you broke it! It took me years to build all this! (MORE)
TED (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And what's it doing in the Old West Town? And is that Batman? It doesn't belong here!  FINN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sorry, Uncle Ted. I just wanted to play.  TED

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, life isn't all play. Sometimes it's serious and it gets screwed up and you don't feel like playing. You just wish for once everything was in the right place.  FINN (DISAPPOINTED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Finn goes off. Ted picks up a tube of Krazy Glue.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Emmet looks at the gum wrapper. Confused, he puts the wrapper in his purse/backpack. He is startled by:  VITRUVIUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't suppose this is the restroom?  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. Definitely not. (then, stopping him) Hey, Can I ask you something? I keep having these strange dreams about a squishy bumpy giant--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vitruvius stops.  VITRUVIUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Visions of the Maker. Quite unusual.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What does it mean? Do I have a fate?  VITRUVIUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We all have a fate. But MasterBuilding is about channeling the power of the Maker, and taking that fate into our own hands. I guess it could mean what you choose to make it mean. 75.   EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why do you always talk in weird riddles? I just want answers.  VITRUVIUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then why don't you try building something for yourself?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Emmet builds himself a little mecha-bird, like the one that Vitruvius made earlier. It's adorable.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sorry, that's lame.  MECHA-BIRD (PARROTING)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's lame. That's lame.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The bird flies off a few feet and CRASHES into a tree, losing some pieces, then flies off all wobbly.  VITRUVIUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not bad. You're learning now.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No I'm not. I'm just copying what you did.  VITRUVIUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A dilettante borrows. A true artist steals.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He pats him on the head and walks away. After a beat:  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That makes no sense!  VITRUVIUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And all this does?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Morning is not much different from night at this dark place.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HELICOPTER SHOT: Our heroes hike over a hill.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: At the crest they stop in awe at EMPURA TOWER, rising from the volcano like a midcentury cork.  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How the heck are we going to do this? 76.   EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's okay. I have a plan.  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Really?  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This R2 unit had the plans for Empura Tower stored in its memory bank.  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's convenient.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: R2D2 projects the blueprints for the fortress.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Looking over it last night, I noticed the tower follows the same construction principles as the condos I was building back in Legopolis.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BEGIN OCEAN'S 11-STYLE PLAN SEQUENCE, in which we see the things actually happening as they are described!

dialogues.speaker: EMMET, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: We enter through the base here. Batman, you'll take out all the guards, while the rest of us change into their uniforms, and, posing as the new guards, determine my mother's location. What about a passkey, you ask? We won't need a passkey or whatever security code they have because we'll sneak up the elevator shaft by building our own elevator, which we then take all the way to--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SMASH! The elevator is destroyed by a descending elevator.

dialogues.speaker: BACK TO SCENE
dialogues.text: EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait.  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What about this?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She grabs the plans.  PLANNING SEQUENCE #2:

dialogues.speaker: LUCY, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: We put the guards to sleep with gas. Then build a kickass window- washing apparatus, which, unbeknownst to the baddies, will have all kinds of cool weapons inside and...

dialogues.speaker: EMMET, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: ... be so heavy it will fall under its own weight...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SMASH! The window washing apparatus falls and crashes.

dialogues.speaker: BACK TO SCENE
dialogues.text: LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Darn.  VITRUVIUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How about this?  PLANNING SEQUENCE #3:

dialogues.speaker: VITRUVIUS, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: We build a second tower right next to the first. The whole thing will be an optical illusion, matching exactly the visual of the landscape behind the tower. I'll be the foreman, and--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CRASH! Because Vitruvius was the foreman, the whole tower falls down.

dialogues.speaker: BACK TO SCENE
dialogues.text: VITRUVIUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What, is it because I'm blind?  BATMAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Check this out:  PLANNING SEQUENCE #4

dialogues.speaker: BATMAN, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: I'll take out all the guards with a batarang. Then we'll bust down the front door with a battering batram, look around corners with a batperiscope. Then I'll batcharm my way into the lair, and the Joker will be there. (MORE)

dialogues.speaker: BATMAN, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: I'll be locked in a deep struggle with him that isn't just physical but psychological. We'll talk about how he killed my parents, depending on who you talk to, and how his physical disfigurement and my emotional disfigurement are two sides of the same coin. And then Robin will be like "Can I help" and we'll both be like "NO!" And THEN--

dialogues.speaker: BACK TO SCENE
dialogues.text: NECKBEARD

dialogues.speaker: AHOY
dialogues.text: PLANNING SEQUENCE #5

dialogues.speaker: NECKBEARD, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: We attack with the cannons first! Then convince the guards to mutiny. But then: Mermaids! A curse upon their wicked kind!

dialogues.speaker: BACK TO SCENE
dialogues.text: LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stop it! Everyone!  VITRUVIUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Creativity in groups is hard.

dialogues.speaker: EMMET, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Unless...  PLANNING SEQUENCE #6

dialogues.speaker: EMMET, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: We get a bunch of snacks and a conference room filled with toys and funny posters, and discuss the plan in a group. We'll have rules of play, such as 'Yes and,' not `No, but' so we can keep criticism constructive and keep the process moving forward, and slowly over many iterations of the process we'll add the best thoughts from everyone until we have a plan that's more robust and creative than anything any of us could have come up with on his or her own! 79.

dialogues.speaker: BACK TO SCENE
dialogues.text: LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We don't have time for that.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Or we can just wing it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everyone AGREES to wing it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A suspicious-looking DELIVERY TRUCK shows up. There's one guard back there, talking on his phone.  SERVICE NINJA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, I don't know, I've lived alone a long time, and sharing space with you is a new thing for me...no it's not like that... (REALIZING)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, we didn't order any--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lucy appears behind him, grabs him and GAGS him.  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (man voice, into phone) I love you please move in with me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Our gang quickbuilds the truck into an awesome TOWER CLIMBING DEVICE with suction cups. It begins its climb.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: INSIDE the device, our guys rapidly move bricks so that the side facing the building is an 8-bit image of the landscape behind it, making it nearly invisible.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Some skeletons are in a board meeting. One looks outside and squints. He sees an 8-bit LEGO version of the landscape slowly pass by. Rubs his eyes, and it's GONE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The machine cuts through the window of an empty room. Our guys crawl inside, nervously...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The office we saw earlier. 80.   EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Black Falcon's office!  BATMAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My office is bigger.  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Emmet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She motions to an "IDEAS" notebook. There is nothing in there. There's also a picture of the BF's middle school class photo with Doris in it. The BF has drawn a funny moustache on her. Emmet smashes the picture in anger.  NECKBEARD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Arr, his appointment book be saying he be scheduled for a massage at four.  BATMAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He'll get a flipping massage alright.  DAD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Language! There are kids here.  BATMAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who are these nerds?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's the diorama family from earlier. Still frozen. The family members are separated, unable to touch.  SON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We, uh, can't move.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lucy tries to lift the daughter but she's stuck to her chair which is stuck to the floor.  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They won't budge.  DAUGHTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The bad guy is going to freeze everyone.  MOM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kids? Are you okay?  DAD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're alright, baby.  SON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I miss you, mom. 81.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Emmet's heart breaks.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Me too. (THEN)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is really sad. How can you keep living like this?  DAD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, yeah, we can't be together. We can't touch or see each other. But in here-- and if I could, I'd be pointing to my head-- I'm not stuck. In my brain we're sharing a delicious meal together.  MOM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you sweetie.  DAUGHTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pass the mustard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They all play along.  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's pretty elaborate.  DAD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They can freeze you. They can tell you what to do. But they can't stop our secret weapon. Ideas. (THEN)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now go give `em hell.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lucy starts to exit.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait. Batman, give me your Batperiscope.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Emmet grabs some nearby tubes and goes to work. He's not a quickbuilder, he's more methodical. What's he up to?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Emmet places a FOUR-WAY PERISCOPE in front of their faces.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now at least you can see each other. 82.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They smile at one another. Emmet smiles. Lucy looks at him. That's the guy she used to love.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Black Falcon stomps down the hallway. People tremble in his wake. A flank of baddies stops and salutes.

dialogues.speaker: "THE BLACK FALCON"
dialogues.text: You there. Listen to me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: REVEAL it's not the The Black Falcon at all, but rather, Neckbeard's head on top of a black-Sharpied R2D2.  NINJA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You have grown a beard.

dialogues.speaker: "THE BLACK FALCON"
dialogues.text: I be trying it out. What do ye think?  NINJA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's very nice.

dialogues.speaker: "THE BLACK FALCON"
dialogues.text: Thank you. Arr.  NINJA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is there something in your throat, sir?

dialogues.speaker: "THE BLACK FALCON"
dialogues.text: Yes. It be a new throat something I'm trying out. Do ye like it?  NINJA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Very much.

dialogues.speaker: "THE BLACK FALCON"
dialogues.text: Say, I beed wondering if you could do me a favor.  NINJA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: At your service, commander.

dialogues.speaker: "THE BLACK FALCON"
dialogues.text: Take off your ninja clothes.  NINJA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir?

dialogues.speaker: "THE BLACK FALCON"
dialogues.text: I be the boss, ain't I be? 83.   NINJA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, sir.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They do as instructed. Into their skivvies.

dialogues.speaker: "THE BLACK FALCON"
dialogues.text: Now pull each other's heads off and kick them way down the hallway where you can't see them anymore.  NINJA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, sir-- ow!

dialogues.speaker: "THE BLACK FALCON"
dialogues.text: Very good. Now count to one thousand.

dialogues.speaker: NINJA, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: (in the distance) Yes sir.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly our heroes jump out from the shadows and put on the ninja clothes.

dialogues.speaker: "THE BLACK FALCON"
dialogues.text: This be awesome.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Guards hear the door open and stand at attention. In walk NECKBEARD and the GANG, all dressed up as ninjas.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They stare up at the THINK TANK. All kinds of MasterBuilders hooked up to tubes. Awful. You can't help but be upset at the inhumanity of the whole thing.  ROBOSKELETON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Black Falcon? You're supposed to be at your massage.

dialogues.speaker: "THE BLACK FALCON"
dialogues.text: I uh...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Neckbeard's head falls off R2D2. FIGHT! Our guys kick the crap out of the guards, who try and fail to sound an alarm. It's a bar brawl, and Batman really shines.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Emmet rushes up into the Think Tank and finds his MOM. Everything else slows down. The sounds of the fighting fall away. He's so glad to see her. Wouldn't you be?  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mom... 84.   DORIS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What? Emmet?  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's me, Mom. I've here to save you, so you can save the world.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He pulls out the MASTERPIECE.

dialogues.speaker: BLACK FALCON, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: I don't think she'll be doing that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Black Falcon has entered, flanked by Bad Cop and a legion of robo-soldiers!  VITRUVIUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rodrigo Falcone. My old student. It's time you went back to SCHOOL! (TO OTHERS)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Our heroes make a break for the exit, as Vitruvius squares off with the Black Falcon. Vitruvius spins, grabs some pieces of the Think Tank and uses his staff to guide an ELECTRICAL BOLT at him. The Black Falcon deflects.  BLACK FALCON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The old dog still has a few tricks. But I guess your friends didn't tell you that I was flanked by like a hundred soldiers. Now!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: RoboNinjas fling a RUBBER BAND from a PAPERCLIP (like when they got Doris in Act I) and it binds him instantly.  BLACK FALCON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get the rest of them!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Our heroes book it. Emmet helps Doris.  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why won't anything in this hallway break off?!  BATMAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's Kragle-frozen! Batcrap!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reveal Bad Cop and the RoboNinjas closing in on them. 85.   NECKBEARD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lucy.  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes?  NECKBEARD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I want you to know, I love you.  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Me too...  NECKBEARD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And even if the world be ending, and we all get frozen, I'd feel better about the whole situation if I could get frozen with you as my bride.  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you really doing this?  NECKBEARD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lucy. Will you take me hand in marriage? Metaphorically.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lucy stops, frozen...with INDECISION! She looks at Emmet. Emmet smiles bravely at her as he runs.  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Um...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lucy's indecision made her fall behind and a RUBBER BAND flings and wraps her up! Neckbeard tries to change direction but winds up rolling down the hall.  NECKBEARD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lucy!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bad Cop et al reload.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mom! Hurry!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fling! Doris is wrapped up.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fling! Emmet is wrapped up, with the MasterPiece still in his hands. 86.   DORIS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Neckbeard tries to go back and rescue them, but Batman grabs his head. Well, all of him, really.  BATMAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We can't win this. We've got to hide and make a new plan.  NECKBEARD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (knows he's right) Arrr!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman, Benny, Neckbeard and R2D2 run around the corner. Bad Cop has rounded up Lucy, Emmet, and Doris.  BAD COP (TO ROBO-SOLDIERS)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Take these perps to the Black Falcon's office. The rest of you, follow me. Looks like we'll be playing a little game of hide and seek.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He puts on his LEGO sunglasses, tough cop-style.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now Emmet, Doris, Lucy and Vitruvius are all tied up in a row facing the window. The Black Falcon inspects his prisoners.

dialogues.speaker: THE BLACK FALCON
dialogues.text: Aw how cute. Mother and son... together at last. And what's this?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He takes the MasterPiece out of Emmet's hands.

dialogues.speaker: THE BLACK FALCON
dialogues.text: I've been looking for a paperweight. (TO EMMET)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did you really think you were going to come up here and save the day? You're a follower, my friend. You don't have the stuff. (TO DORIS)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And you. You must be real proud of this one, huh? He's a credit to the family. Just like his talentless father. 87.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This stings. He is not nice.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mom, I'm so sorry.  DORIS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know sweetie.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just- tell me everything's going to be okay.  DORIS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I wish I could, son.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mom... Why didn't you -- why didn't you teach me what you knew?  DORIS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I wanted you to be safe. I thought you would be happier. When I saw you with that funny drawing, it was so marvelous. And then I thought of what your life would be, how everyone would treat you. I just couldn't let that happen.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know you're the Chosen One, but-- I just wish you had let me choose for myself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ouch. Doris feels awful. The fighting's stopped.  DORIS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I...I don't know what to say.

dialogues.speaker: THE BLACK FALCON
dialogues.text: You guys want to see it? Let me take you up to the construction site! Things are about to get a little sticky down here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He pushes a big red button and the ground begins to shake. The Black Falcon smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The tower begins transforming. Wings come out. Rockets fire, and the volcano ERUPTS! The tower BLASTS OFF like a rocketship with thunderous power. It climbs high into the air and SMASHES THROUGH THE LEGO SKY! 88.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They stare agape out of the picture window as the world falls away. They are now in...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When we look below, we see all the lands we have visited, each walled silos apart from one another. Like the neurons in Emmet's brain at the start of the movie.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PAN UP to find a scary, gray, HUGE FOUR-PEG LEGO BRICK, made out of millions of smaller LEGO bricks. The tower docks with it, a perfect tetris piece that makes it finally whole. This is the SpaceStation SUPERBRICK.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Inside it's an enormous indoor INSTRUCTION SITE filled with instruction workers working on something big. The Black Falcon's office penthouse is one of the top pegs, looking over everything like a control tower. Emmet notices his instruction worker pals from Act I.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They got promoted...

dialogues.speaker: THE BLACK FALCON
dialogues.text: Behold: The SuperKragleThingy Part II.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reveal a huge ROBOTIC MONSTER, a hundred men tall, like a mechanical Godzilla-raptor. It has a name plate reading "Brought to you by Empura".

dialogues.speaker: THE BLACK FALCON
dialogues.text: It's my best work.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But you didn't do anything.

dialogues.speaker: THE BLACK FALCON
dialogues.text: Are you kidding? You think the MasterBuilders just up and forced themselves to think of this? Did those guys force themselves to build it? No. I did. Ergo, it's mine. (THEN)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look down there. 89.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Black Falcon looks down upon all his dominions, separated by walls, like LEGO sets lined up together.

dialogues.speaker: THE BLACK FALCON
dialogues.text: Magnificent, isn't it? And now it will be just the way I want.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A worker puts the last piece on. Another flips a switch. The SuperKragleThingy Part II ("SKT2") lights up!

dialogues.speaker: THE BLACK FALCON
dialogues.text: Release the Kragle!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They watch below as HUNDREDS of Bad guys in helmets stream into HUNDREDS of cockpits all over the SKT2. They put in ignition keys in unison. The SKT2 thunders to life as the hangar door opens and it rockets out of the Superbrick...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CONTINUOUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiding inside a supply closet, watching through a crack, are Benny, Neckbeard, Batman and R2D2. Guards looking for them.  BATMAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That does not look good.  NECKBEARD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When do we get to the part about coming up with a plan?  BENNY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've got a plan.  NECKBEARD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uh-oh.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He points across the hangar: There are a bunch of spaceships.  NECKBEARD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What about Lucy and the others?  BENNY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We'll come back for them. After we stop that Kragle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's right. They make a break for it, as the huge hangar door starts closing. They run up to a black spaceship. 90.   BENNY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can we go in the blue one?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bad Cop spots them, flanked by RoboNinjas.  BAD COP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There they are!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bad Cop and the RoboNinjas run after them.  NECKBEARD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What does it matter?  BENNY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I fly better in blue.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They run over to the blue spaceship and pile in just in time to BLAST OFF just as the hangar door closes!  BAD COP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No! Re-open the door! Everyone in ships! Go!  ROBONINJA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dude, you don't have to yell.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The RoboNinjas pop off their ninja veils and pop on space helmets, climb in the remaining ships and take off!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The SKT2 lands with an earth-shattering THOOM! Animals scurry! It's the most impressive thing in the universe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BF's Executive Window has become a huge monitor. The Black Falcon watches SKT2 on it and barks orders into a microphone.

dialogues.speaker: THE BLACK FALCON
dialogues.text: Left. Right. Straight. Now stand up super tall and scary!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The operators of the SKT2 follow his every command, until it stops at a tiny house. A hobbit comes out, pissed.  HOBBIT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Every time!-- 91.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The hobbit's jaw drops as he looks up and takes in the sight of the SKT2 belching a fine mist of glue all over him and the rest of the hobbit huts. He freezes!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BLACK FALCON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bahahahahahahaha!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The SKT2 LAUGHS the same way, then belches glue-mist over the entire land. Leaping deer freeze mid-leap. The waterfall stops mid-flow. When it's done, the SKT2 LEAPS into the air like the Hulk, landing in...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Emmet's house. SMASH! The SKT2's foot smashes down. Pan up to show it about to freeze Emmet's hometown.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Strapped in rubber bands, all our heroes can do is watch the horror on the monitors. Doris turns away.  DORIS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's too horrible to bear.  VITRUVIUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is? Describe it to me. I feel really really left out!  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The world is ending.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Emmet looks around, and eyes the MasterPiece, sitting on the console as a paperweight. Next to it is the MAGNIFYING GLASS on the Black Falcon's desk that he used like 70 pages ago. Emmet gets an idea.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Benny flies in crazy curly-cues as he avoids Bad Cop's army of bad guy spaceships! He also jettisons small pieces along the way. 92.   BATMAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go down to the city! What are you doing?  BENNY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Calling for help from my space friends!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WIDE, we see the jettisoned pieces have formed skywriting: S.O.S.  NECKBEARD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What, a bunch of mops? There be no space friends! Just go!  BENNY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alright, you don't have to be mean about it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He heads for the city way down below.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The SKT2 belches a gluey mist around the city!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Larry, the Barrista, steps out and does a full-on Laura Dern holy-flip-it's-a-dinosaur jaw drop. The SKT2 stomps around belching.  LARRY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: < SIGH > Of course.

dialogues.speaker: OTHER COFFEE GUY
dialogues.text: What the heck is happening?  LARRY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think a big dinobot is freezing everything with mucusy sneezes.

dialogues.speaker: OTHER COFFEE GUY
dialogues.text: So we're doomed? What do we do?  LARRY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know. Complain?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The crazy MECHA-BIRD that Emmet built lands nearby.  LARRY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I mean, it's not like we can do anything. 93.   MECHABIRD (PARROTING)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...We can do anything! ...We can do anything!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The mechabird lands on the other barrista.

dialogues.speaker: OTHER COFFEE GUY
dialogues.text: How annoying.  LARRY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait a minute...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WE ZOOM INTO LARRY'S BRAIN! The same thing that happened to Emmet. Synapses fire. He gets.... An IDEA!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Larry puts two pieces together. The 2001 theme plays... ...in our heads, but not in the actual soundtrack, because that would be super clichГ©.

dialogues.speaker: OTHER COFFEE GUY
dialogues.text: What are you doing?  LARRY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know exactly. I'm just going with it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: His friend follows suit. This catches on, and the citizens of Legopolis start to build all kinds of crazy MECHA-BIRDS! Larry's is the most fanciful.

dialogues.speaker: OTHER COFFEE GUY
dialogues.text: Larry. My goodness.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The birds take off and start to flock together. They fly up and get in the way of the robot's eyeline.

dialogues.speaker: THE BLACK FALCON
dialogues.text: What?! This is terrible! I can't see! (TO VITRUVIUS)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No offense. (THEN)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who the heck did that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The remote camera focuses on Larry the Barrista.  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That guy?! 94.

dialogues.speaker: THE BLACK FALCON
dialogues.text: Hey! Guys! Swipe! Swipe! No! You're doing it wrong! Ugh... This is a disaster!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: While the Black Falcon is distracted, Emmet slowly hops over to the desk and bumps it, jostling the magnifying glass half over the edge of the desk. He shimmies under it. The magnifying glass lens concentrates the light and starts to BURN away the rubber band binding him up.  BLACK FALCON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do I smell something burning? It smells like a tire fire in here.  LUCY (COVERING)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Excuse me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Black Falcon goes back to barking orders. Meanwhile, the rubber band is almost burned through. Emmet struggles to move himself closer and BURNS his hand.  EMMET (SOTTO)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ow!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And he's free! Yes! Behind BF's back, he frees his mom and hands her the MasterPiece.  EMMET (SOTTO)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mom. Go. Do whatever you're supposed to do!  DORIS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I... don't know what to do. So tired...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Doris is super out of it.  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She's too weak. You have to do it.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do what? What can I do?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Emmet unties Lucy. 95.   LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I believe in you, Emmet. I was mad because you disappointed me for a while, but since it wasn't your fault, I'm willing to give you a mulligan on it.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A what?  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A mulligan. It's from golf.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You play golf?  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The point is, you've spent your whole life wanting to fit in and have friends, by pretending to be something you're not. But now that you've let the real you shine through, you've made some friends who like you for who you are. And even if they're just a crazy spaceman and a pirate head and a blind man and an intern--  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You like me?  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I do.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Neckbeard likes me?  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...Sure.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But... I'm not the Chosen One.  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You wanted to make your own choices, right? So choose yourself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Emmet looks down on it. Then down on his arm. The BURN MARK from just a minute a go is in the shape of a STAR.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nuh uh. 96.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Emmet's eyes roll back. He can suddenly "see" the pieces, like we've seen other MasterBuilders do. But in a way that's even cooler than how they did. He smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Black Falcon turns around, finally noticing.

dialogues.speaker: THE BLACK FALCON
dialogues.text: Wait, what's going on?! What the hell are you smiling about?!  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He uses the MasterPiece, the loose pieces on the desk, and the Maker relics he'd been collecting the whole movie to build something strange. It's a large circle with the laser pointer bouncing off the reflecting gum wrapper with the MasterPiece on top, forming a badass looking LASER PORTAL TO INFINITY.  DORIS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is it, Emmet?  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know. It just came to me.  VITRUVIUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You have channeled the Maker and chosen your fate. You have chosen to be the Chosen One.

dialogues.speaker: THE BLACK FALCON
dialogues.text: You are going to defeat me by making some kind of art? Ha ha ha! Oh let me put on my Pink Floyd album so I can totally zone out! Ha ha ha this is so lame!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Emmet slowly walks towards it, and light from the portal swells, enveloping Emmet completely. He DISAPPEARS! And the portal with it!  BLACK FALCON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whoa. That was weird.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The SKT2 is swatting away birds and staggering around.

dialogues.speaker: THE BLACK FALCON, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: (in cockpit headsets) Crush them! Stomp on them before they get any more ideas! 97.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The SKT2 lifts a giant mecha-leg above a crowd of barristas and cityfolk, who run in panic under the huge shadow, about to be crushed, when...  LARRY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the heck is that?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In comes Benny, Neckbeard and Batman in their spaceship! It shoots at the SKT2's foot, and it pulls its foot away! Yeah! But their little pea-shooter can do little damage to this Goliath overall.  BENNY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wow, that thing is really big.  NECKBEARD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uh, Benny...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hot on their tail is Bad Cop and the other spaceships, who pursue Benny's ship through the skyscrapers all around LEGOPOLIS!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Black Falcon rocks the mic.

dialogues.speaker: THE BLACK FALCON
dialogues.text: Get that spaceship out of there! I don't want to freeze space stuff in the city--OOF!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vitruvius just suckerpunched him! The Black Falcon stares at Vitruvius, Lucy, and Doris, ready to fight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Beat, then: The Black Falcon runs away! He opens his closet door, pulls an ESCAPE HATCH, and shoots off.  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do we do?  DORIS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go after him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They grab parts around the office and quickbuild their own spaceship out of a desk and whatever they can find. 98.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The sky battle continues as the Black Falcon zooms down to the city, docks his ESCAPE HATCH SPACESHIP into the central cockpit of the SKT2, and assumes command.

dialogues.speaker: THE BLACK FALCON
dialogues.text: If you want to get something done, you have to do it yourself!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He pushes a button marked "TURBO" and sends a nuclear bomb of Kragle Belch out of the SKT2's mouth.  LARRY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quick, everyone! Run behind it! Get away from the mist!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The army of citizens runs as fast as it can towards the SKT2 to avoid getting in the line of glue, but the Kragle blast arrives, and many of them are FROZEN!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - A person is about to vote. FROZEN!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - Two teens with braces are about to have their first kiss on the prom dance floor. FROZEN!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - A baby is delivered to his father.  DOCTOR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's a b--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - A street performer pretending to be a robot FREEZES!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Surrounded by laserbeams, Emmet is levitated through the universe. He is split into pieces - like he is becoming one with the fabric of the universe. He is traveling between the seams. Eventually rising straight towards the brightest star in the sky.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The closer we get, we realize that it is not a star at all, but a HOLE in the fabric of the universe. A hole just barely big enough for Emmet to fit through. Well, not quite big enough. He is stuck. 99.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Emmet finally wiggles through a hole in a black piece of FELT FABRIC. He rubs his eyes and sees an entire human- sized basement in a LIVE ACTION WORLD. It's like nothing Emmet has ever seen before.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He marvels at a coffee cup with pencils in it. Stares at his reflection in a snowglobe.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So...not square.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Something catches his eye. He turns around and sees

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AN ENTIRE LEGO UNIVERSE laid out below. It's a more mundane version of Emmet's world: the lands are not as vast, towers not as tall, but it's all there: representations of the city, waterfall, space cube, etc. Each area separated by walls - backdrops laid down by a collector. It's pretty much the coolest collection of LEGO sets anyone could ever hope to build.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He looks at his feet and sees tons of loose LEGO parts. He realizes he's standing in the middle of a bin of LEFTOVER LEGO pieces.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Maker. It's all real...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He looks up to see TED, a human being, staring at him. EMMET TED

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Emmet runs! Ted tries to brush Emmet away, causing a pen knife to fall on Ted's hand. EMMET TED

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It just tried to kill me! It just tried to kill me!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - Emmet grabs a cocktail toothpick and parries Ted's flyswatter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - Emmet jumps on Ted and Ted tries to get him off. Emmet clings to Ted's Ear, screaming into it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - Emmet punches Ted in the face while Ted swings and misses Emmet because he is so small.  TED

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the heck are you?! 100.   EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the heck are you?!  TED

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm a person.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm a person. You on the other hand are a giant squishy beast.  TED

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're a talking toy. This is considerably less cute than I have been led to believe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ted touches Emmet's face. Emmet touches Ted's face. They do a version of the mirror bit from Duck Soup.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So ugly...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Emmet puts his hand up Ted's nose.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are these?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ted sneezes all over Emmet.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: AHHHHHH
dialogues.text: TED

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Calm down! Where did you come from?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Emmet looks back towards the LEGO set. It's all messed up from the fighting.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did you build that?  TED

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, but it's seriously messed up.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you the Maker?  TED

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The what? (THEN)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Finn comes bounding downstairs. 101.   FINN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Finn stops in his tracks.  TED

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you seeing this?  FINN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Two Makers?  TED

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How did this-- what is-- my sets, THEY'RE ALL--  FINN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The guys. They needed my help.  TED

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Against what?  FINN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Against the Kragle.  TED

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The what?  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Kragle. The thing that is freezing everything together.  TED

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh. Krazy Glue?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He gestures to a big box of Krazy Glue tubes. Emmet GASPS in horror.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good Lord.  TED

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What? I'm using this to glue my set together. So it won't get messed up by the kid.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But then-- it can never change.  TED

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Exactly. It's the only thing in my life that's perfect. (MORE)
TED (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't find a job that doesn't make me hate myself. My girlfriend dumped me for a rich trustafarian... dingaling, is what he is, and I'm watching my sister's kid while she has a fun time partying in the Hamptons with her annoying brood of hot girlfriends who won't have a thing to do with me, and the only thing I have in my life that makes any sense, that I have any control over is that perfect world right there.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But... nothing is perfect unless it can change. You can make something, you know, and it can be great, for a while, but then... then someone maybe adds to it, makes something new out of it. And that keeps happening until it becomes something that a single person could never envision. Truth is, creating alone is never as good as creating with others.  TED

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: See. No. That's not true- because with others, they don't see things the same way, so--  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know. You want to control everything. I get it. But if you succeed, in the end, all you'll ever have is what you've got.  TED

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What else could I have?  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who knows? That's the best part.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ted looks at Finn. Then at Emmet. Then at his glue. He gets something and hands it to Emmet. It's a GLUE CAP.  TED

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Use this.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is it? 103.   TED

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is it? It's the ca--  FINN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cone of Power. It's called the Cone of Power.  TED

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay. The Cone of Power.  FINN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Put it on the Kragle to stop it.  TED

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah. Try that.  EMMET
