dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you. It was nice to meet you both, disgusting squishy giant Maker creature and smaller, messier giant Maker creature.  FINN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nice to meet you.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I should go save the world now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Emmet turns and goes back through the makerpeeper hole, back through the portal. Ted picks up a bottle of Krazy Glue-dissolving MINERAL SPIRITS and turns to Finn.  TED

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's play.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Emmet careens through the laser tunnel towards LEGOPOLIS. Like a meteor reentering the Earth's atmosphere.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Emmet hits the ground, making a LEGO crater. He raises the Cone of Power and dashes toward the SKT2.

dialogues.speaker: THE BLACK FALCON
dialogues.text: Detach and mobilize! Stop that loser!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Remember how I said there were hundreds of baddies in LEGO COCKPITS all over the SKT2? 104.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, those guys jump out and form a ground army of ROBO- VIKINGS and SKELETONS and such! Emmet charges for them, seriously outmanned.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leading the charge is Bad Cop in his Police-Spaceship. He has Emmet in his sights... He closes in, firing his blasters, when he looks up for a minute to see...  BENNY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hello!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Benny's ship, headed straight for him! Benny, Neckbeard, Batman and R2D2 dive out just before their ship CRASHES into Bad Cop's, BREAKING HIM AND HIS SHIP TO PIECES! Benny et al land safely, right next to Emmet.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thanks for dropping in.  BATMAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I hope we're not imposing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Emmet and the gang quickbuild-fight against the army. Neckbeard headbutts a row of skeletons- they fall like dominoes. Batman uses his Batarang to pop off the heads of a row of Robo-Vikings. But the badguy spaceships are still circling and shooting.  BATMAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's too many of them!  NECKBEARD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're coming at us from all sides!  BENNY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Guy! Look up! My space friends! They got my message!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A FLEET OF SPACESHIPS arrives, filled with assorted characters. For example, Harry Potter and Indiana Jones and Han Solo are all in the Millennium Falcon.  HAN SOLO

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anything for you, Benny!  INDY (TO HAN)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, you look familiar.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Also, there is a spaceship driven by a bunch of MOPS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lucy, Doris and Vitruvius are in their office desk-shaped spaceship. Neckbeard shouts up from below! 105.   NECKBEARD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lucy!  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Neckbeard! We need to talk...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Looking at the the desk ship.  LARRY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I could build such a better ship than that.

dialogues.speaker: OTHER COFFEE GUY
dialogues.text: Why don't we?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They do! Other people looking around follow suit, but in their own unique way. They all shoot off, until collectively, they have formed an ARMADA OF SILLY SHIPS!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Even King Karl flies in on his dino-rocket and joins the air battle as the land battle wages on.  ON EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Amid the massive battle on air and land, Emmet makes his way through the armies to the SuperKragleThingy2...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Inside the SKT2.

dialogues.speaker: THE BLACK FALCON
dialogues.text: Didn't your mom tell you? She designed this thing with a missile launcher!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He flips a switch and the SKT2 extends a mecha-arm, launching a huge MISSILE right towards Emmet!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Amidst the air battle, Doris looks out the window to see Emmet on the ground, about to be hit by the missile.  DORIS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Emmet!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She steels herself. Gets some of her energy back.  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Doris, are you okay back there? 106.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But Doris is gone. She's free-falling to the ground.  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Doris?! Why did she do that?  VITRUVIUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The connection between a mother and son is a powerful thing.  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But it's certain death.  VITRUVIUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On the contrary. It's connections like those that give the best chance to survive...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lucy looks out to the Larry's fanciful armada. Hmmmm...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Doris gathers her strength in mid-air. Starts building a protective shield to cover her and Emmet. Can she do it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: YES! She lands with confidence. Poise. STRENGTH. A shield around her son, as well as her loving embrace. BOOM! The missile explodes, but they stand firm.  DORIS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get your hands off my flipping son.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Doris attacks the baddies with heretofore unseen ferocity. She breaks apart streetlamps and makes weapons. A mother protecting her son. She's like a whirling, quickbuilding kung-fu superstar. She is the best fighter in the universe.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mom... Wow. Just... wow.  DORIS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm the Chosen One, remember?  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I guess that makes two of us.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They start to fight TOGETHER. Kicking much butt. It's superbadass and incredibly heartwarming to see them finally working as a team. 107.   DORIS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I was wrong, Emmet. (BAM!) All this time I was trying to keep you from getting hurt, so I told you not to make waves. (POW!) I'm just so glad that I get to see the beautiful waves you finally get to make.(SOCKO!)  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (WHAM!) I love you, Mom. (CRACK!)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They make their way to the SKT2, but the Black Falcon sees them coming!

dialogues.speaker: THE BLACK FALCON
dialogues.text: Aw. That's sweet. I want to take a picture so I can remember you like this FOREVER!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The SKT2 takes in a big inhale, about to freeze them... When in lands the most colorful and whimsical SUPERROBOT ever. Exactly opposite of the SKT2. It's made up of all the ships that the citizens of LEGOPOLIS have built. This is WHIMSYBOT, and LUCY's is in the center.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lucy? How did you do that?  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I used a few connections.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LEGO ROBOT FIGHT! WhimsyBot clocks SKT2! They knock over buildings! WHAMO! It's awesome! The WhimsyBot gains the upper hand, knocks the SKT2 on its BUTT!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This gives Emmet and Doris a clear pathway to climb on to the SKT2 and scramble up to the cockpit where the Black Falcon is. Doris rips open the cockpit with her bare hands. She jumps in and kicks the Black Falcon's ass.  DORIS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Emmet, now's your chance!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Emmet scrambles to the SKT2's mouth, holding the Cone of Power at the Kragle. But at the last second, his route is cut off by the BLACK FALCON, holding Doris hostage.

dialogues.speaker: THE BLACK FALCON
dialogues.text: Nuh-uh-uh. One step closer, and bye-bye mommy. Now go away, you freak, you weirdo, you loser. You don't belong here. You don't belong anywhere. 108.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EMMET GETS AN IDEA - we see this as we have before.  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're right. I don't belong here...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And he runs away... or does he? No! He runs around the back of the SKT2 and tunnels in through the back of its head! He lifts the CONE OF POWER!  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I belong here!

dialogues.speaker: THE BLACK FALCON
dialogues.text: No!  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rest in pieces.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And he caps the Kragle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A beat. Then the whole SKT2 EXPLODES into a million LEGO pieces! Emmet and Doris and The Black Falcon are thrown high into the air.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: OVER AT THE VOLCANO across the world: The Black Falcon falls into the Volcano lava lamely. PLOP.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DOWN IN LEGOPOLOIS, everyone GASPS. It seems the SKT2 explosion killed Emmet and Doris.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's when two enormous five-fingered LEGO clouds shaped like hands, one grown up one, one kid one, enter the frame from above. THE HANDS OF THE MAKER(s). They catch Emmet and Doris in midair, and put them together safely on the ground.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Emmet holds the original Kragle tube, and gives it back to the Cloud Hands, which take it up in the sky in a marvelous light show. Think the Abyss, or Close Encounters. Everyone stares at it, admiring the artistry. The lights shines in their faces.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We see Finn and Ted playing together. Being silly. They "flip" the Krazy Glue end over end into the GARBAGE.

dialogues.speaker: FINN AND TED
dialogues.text: < EXPLOSION NOISES >

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The lands begin to UNFREEZE!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - A person votes!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - Two teens with braces finally Kiss!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - A baby is delivered to his father.  DOCTOR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --oy!  FATHER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank God!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - the robot performer unfreezes! But doesn't move. :(

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The frozen diorama family UNFREEZES, and wraps each other in a big family hug.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The walls of the different worlds come CRUMBLING DOWN. Knights hug cops; Wizards hug robots; everyone CHEERS. Batman hugs Princess Leia, who is creeped out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lucy emerges from the wreckage. She looks around.  LUCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the heck just happened?  EMMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Something totally foofy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Emmet hugs Lucy and they KISS as well as a minifig can. Meanwhile, Neckbeard and Doris check each other out a little.  NECKBEARD (WINKING)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ahoy there.
